The other winged arm of the feral came swinging out, snatching Ruga with a loud snap.

âAgh! No!â He yelled out before the Aerodactyl slammed his body into a rock wall, flying upward to drag Ruga into the mountain gravel. The infected dragon plucks him out of the rock, appeased to find the Flygon to writhe helplessly and in tired anguish as it landed on a nearby ledge. Shasta wriggles within her drastic distress, growling and endeavoring to plug her arms out. Opening her maw to fire off a Flamethrower, she soon finds a massive, fat tongue lowering down to scraped over her entire body, almost sliding her out of the Aerodactylâs fist. The dragon murred as hot and thick curtains of drool smeared over the Ninetalesâ form. Shasta shivered as the warm goo cascades onto her, letting her to simply sit in her bath torture until the rough tongue ditches her spit-covered body and over to the dry dragon next to her. She listened to the many licks and resentful grunts of Rugaâs mirrored punishment as Shasta cursed herself.

âThis is what I get for trying to help others! I should've never let this dragon tag along! Now Iâm surely feral fat at this rateâ¦â Her mind conjured. A loud snap suddenly stole her attention. The Ninetales looks up to see Rugaâs tail wiggling aimlessly outside of the grey dragonâs lips. With closed eyes, the Aerodactyl growled by the pokemonâs meaty body and flavor, quickly and quite loudly swallowing the other dragon down into its belly. Shasta unwillingly watched the grumbling bulge sink down the infectedâs long neck, past its chest to lump out its scaled gut even more. The potbelly sagged and kicked out from Rugaâs struggles, rousing the Aerodactyl to growl louder.

Its lavender stare strikes Shasta, giving it an idea of how to enjoy its second course. Shasta eeps as her body is grabbed by the scruff of her neck and lifted high above the Aerodactylâs head. Its sinister face stared at the Ninetalesâ underside, blissfully enjoying watching its victim struggle and swing in the air in a pointless manner. Finally, the pinched fingertips released the fox anthro downward, plummeting her body for a wet, muscles bed to land on. Darkness overcame her surroundings once its jaws shut close, twisting its tongue and coiling Shasta within its stuffed cheeks. Its gums and tastebuds squish her body, softly nibbling the helpless pokemon as she cried out fearfully. Dense spittle slathered her fur to slicken down to marinate her, preparing her body to sink down into its tight throat.

Shasta whimpered as the muscles convulsed into her, pulling her into the esophagus to travel into the tunnel throbbing at her filling. The squelching innards and slimy walls pierce Shastaâs heart into panic and disappointment as the throat works her down inside the dragonâs stomach, nestled into the slick form of Ruga. He wobbled, pushed, and whimpered madly as the stomach acids began to spew out and coat his thick form, including Shasta's own spit-slathered body as the two of fallen heroes were forced to grind against each other from the rocking motions of the organ. Shasta sags her head down, closing her eyes to await her fate from her failed mission while the wriggling Flygon beside her sobbed at the tingling fizz.

----|----


The infected Aerodactyl listened closely to the audible stomach gurgles emitting from within its gut, feeling the struggles of its prey dwindle into nothingness. Beating its large wings into the air, it flew off back to its nest to rest off the Ninetales and Flygon it was lucky enough to devour. After the close call with the Ninetalesâ attack, it was an excellent thing that she had spent most of all her energy in the single move. It wasn't often the dragon earned to pieces of meat in one sitting.
1511111212.title: One's enough

151111122.content:
A large orange dragon stood out from the crags of the mountain side, emitting a glorious bright light to shine from its open maw. Their purple eye focus on the unaware Flygon as the feral prepares to shoot its Hyper Beam. Shastaâs fur spiked as she began to dash towards Ruga, yelling, âGet out of the way! Move it you big oaf!â

Ruga turned around to look at Shasta, confused in what she was ordering until it was all too late. The infected Dragonite launched its beam towards the Flygon and Ninetales, exploding in an immense combustion of burning rock to catapult the two anthros away from each other. Shasta crashed into the ground, quivering in at the damage she sustained while searching around for Ruga. Past the smoldering crater of the explosion, the Flygon remained laying upon back, motionless from being knocked out.

âD-Dang itâ¦â She uttered before attempting to stand. Her legs wobbled and her muscles ached in pain, plus to add to her misery, her battle stance appeared to be absolutely pathetic while the Dragonite lowered its guard at the sight of its prey already exhausted from its powerful attack. The Ninetales snarled and managed to bolt towards the fat dragon, igniting fire around her fist as she pulled it back for a Fire Punch.

âIt should be slightly weakened from draining its energy for that Hyper Beam. If Iâm going to fight this thing, it has to be quickâ¦!â She thought to herself in her head. Arriving at the still Dragonite, who seemed highly threatened by Shastaâs decision, she hurled her arm out, jabbing the lizardâs scaly belly, only to have it retract and bounce her back to the ground. She gagged as her chest collided into the rocky flooring, and struggled to even move again. The Dragonite chuckled and padded over to the weakened fox, causing tiny tremors to rumble the ground as its steps approached her. Her ears fold back as it lifts one of its intimidating, thick legs, stomping it down to grind her body beneath its clawed footpaw. The orange scaled sole grinded her fuzzy and frail state, puncturing a Ninetales shaped crater in the ground. Shasta whimpered as the Dragonite smushed her smaller body into the gravel before lifting off and letting light enter her eyes once again.

Given the brief moment of the fresh mountain air once her body squirmed along the ground to pull herself out, she quickly felt the Dragoniteâs large rear sit down on top of her, squeezing Shasta back into the floor under is fat scaled mass that it pressed all of its weight on. Wondering if she was truly going to die by being crushed by a big lizardâs ass, an opening oddly clamped over her head. Her environment grew even darker than before, and much hotter to add to that fact.

The Ninetales squirmed about, only to discover that she was being sucked inside its anus! The Dragonite purred as it clenched its globular cheeks together, pulling Shastaâs upper body into its rectum as she writhed in its rumpâs grasp. Rolling onto its hands and knees, the infected lifted its rear end upwards, letting the foxâs kicking legs and swirling tails slide inside its inner workings. Shasta growled within the compacted fleshy tunnel, sinking through the hot tissue and into the large stomach that was somewhat spacious due to the Dragoniteâs size.

She plucked into the pool of digesting enzymes that fizzed around her body. The tingling sensation wasn't at all painful, however, the Ninetales madly kicked and pressed against the walls that softly converged around her.

âGah! This is what I get for trying to protect someone again! You canât trust anyone, whether theyâre treacherous or weak. I gotta get out of here. I have to find the one person I know that can help stop this infection!â She screamed out within the dragonâs gut as the walls were soon closing in on her. Suddenly, a loud tremble shook and sloshed Shasta inside, and out from the same tight ring she had slid through appeared to be tugging a Flygonâs unconscious head in. Rugaâs body was fully pulled inside, and forced into pressing against Shastaâs panicking form. The acids slather the two in its gooey heat after the organ walls had fully encased the two into fixated positions that ceased the Ninetalesâ squirms.

On the outside, the infected Dragonite rubbed over its expanded belly, feeling around the trapped prey inside as the fox it devoured finally passed out in exhaustion. She had been a tough fighter, but now her willpower and energy will provide excellent strength for the Dragonite. It laid back on a rock wall, drumming its scaled gut before falling asleep, letting the Ninetales and Flygon inside digest with a bubbly doom.

152.content:
These storylines are ideas and plans I have for after I finish Lace's quest.

Charm is a female Vaporeon, (who actually makes a cameo appearance in Lace's story,) who works on a farm with her Umbreon father, Jolteon sister, and younger Eevee brother far away from any town. After Charm confronts a strange acting Houndoom, she is forced to leave her home in search for the truth. Little does she know, that a hellhole of a world awaits her to succumb its desire to be filled and pleasured. This story is told in third person point of view.

Phase is a male Mewtwo who discovers that contact from a distant island has disappeared. The island's name is Unova, and anyone who has ever traveled there has never returned. It's up to Phase to reveal the mystery behind Unova, and put a stop to it! This story is different from any other since it only contains fifth generation Pokemon, (except for Phase of course.) This story also is told in third person point of view.

Haven is a female Mandibuzz who travels up a treacherous mountain filled with menacing uninfected legendary Pokemon that would still decide to eat this vulture. Haven is on a search for a cure of an infection after her mother is suddenly possessed by the catastrophic sickness, causing her to want to eat anything alive and whole. Can Haven pass through all of the legendaries that wish to keep the cure a secret for some reason? She will have to go through some tough Pokemon to be able to find out! This story is told in second person point of view.

PLEASE DO NOT ADD TO THESE STORYLINES. I AM JUST PUTTING THEM ON HOLD UNTIL I AM FULLY FINISHED WITH MY FIRST STORYLINE.

Thanks bro! :D

You are Zeke, a seven foot tall rampardos with a short blue pants and not wearing any shirts. 153111112111112111.title: Wes the tyranitar

1531111121111121111.content:
Wes smiled as the aggron had swirling eyes as he rubs his hands together "Whew... Finally... All that fighting worked up and appetite!" He grabs the steel/rock type's head and stuffs it into his maw and swallows. You watch in awe as the tyranitar make the aggron disappear from the outside world and appear as a large, round bulky bulge on his belly as slurps in the thick tail. Wes lets out a loud burp as he looks back at you. "You know, I've been trying to get through the jungle but there are a lot of infected pokemon in there! Not only that but the native pokemon there are also gotten hungry. I had trouble getting pass a scyther clan that lives in that jungle. Maybe you guys can lend me a hand." You nod as Flora steps in "Well we're on a mission to find a cure for this infection." Wes smiled as he pats your friend's head "An admirable quest. I'll help you guys out if you can help me." 1531111121111121111.title: Joining forces

You snapped as the small scyther flew behind a bigger male scyther who stood almost your height. "You have no right to intrude on our land! Leave at once or die!" The scyther turns around and chuckles a bit "Oh they'll be the least of your worries..." You blink a few times and speak out "We're only here to find a grumpig and leave. We didn't-" The large bug/flying type interrupted you by glaring at your eyes as you growl and glare back. "...You seem to be telling the truth... Let's see if you have the strength though." You look behind you and see that the vine belongs to a female venasaur who stood seven feet tall and she starts to pull you back! You growl a bit and pulled with your might and...
15311111211111211111.title: Ominous Jungle

Thinking fast you used Ancient Power to break free from his grip feeling its secnodary effect happen as you by for time before using Flamethrower. So you went for using Head Smash as he counters with another Bullet Punch but this one did less damage to you as you bash your skull against his chest sending him backward a bit.

"I have to admit you're good but this ends here!" The large metal bug charged forward with Iron Head and ramming it at your stomach as you let out a loud grunt as you were knocked backward but you stand your a bit but you flinched from the move and couldn't retaliate. The scizor grinned as he saw that as he fired a Flash Cannon at your face and it explodes on impact knocking you backwards even more as you land on your back. The scizor flies over to your down body and takes a good to see...
1531111121111121111111.title: Time to fight!

15311111211111211111111.content:
"Hmph. So much for your strong power..." The Scizor scoffed as he planted a leg atop your belly. Your eyes remained closed with your mouth open, dangling your tongue out of the side to hang loosely. The bug leader grinned and stepped off, seeing that he was the victor of the match, allowing him to decide you fate. Upon hearing the cheers of his fellow Scythers, the Scizor bent down, ripping off your shorts by his hand-claws to leave your body out naked and ready to eat.

Grabbing your ankles, the Scizor licked over your reptilian paws, purring loudly as his wings buzzed in bliss. Stuffing the feet into his maw, he began to slurp in your legs and tail into his gullet, having his throat stretch and expand out from the filling entry of your body. The bug pokemon hollered and hooted for their leader to gulp your motionless body up, to finish what the Venusaur hadn't accomplished. Scythers were still amazed you escaped her vines, but passed it off as sheer luck. The Scizor licks over your scaly groin and hot member, suckling over your sac as it stirred a grumble from your faintness. Your body twitches in reflex while your chubby belly squishes inside the open jaws, giving the anthro bug some difficulty yet intense pleasure in tasting your scaly, smooth flesh.

You finally begin to open your eyes some, struggling to comprehend your position now. With a single glance, your eyes stretch wide once you discover your chest and backside submerging into the Scizor's throat! You begin to pout and sob, pressing your hands at the basin of his jaws to try and pull yourself out. Your legs and tails are constricted into the tight, slimy innards of the bug leader with your gut being continuously licked over. The action has you throbbing all down across your body, however, your frail arms fail to push your lower posture back out from the mouth.

The bug audience cheered, "Hah hah aha ha! Look at that lizard squirm!"

"Finish him off already!"

"Your time is up, Rampardos!"

"You heard em'." A muffled voice called out and reverberated around your waist. You look down to see that none other than the Scizor had said it, pinching his claws over your shoulders and plunging you father inward. You gasp, finding your chest and arms to disappear under his dragging lips as the inner cheek walls tug on your flesh. You take a last look at your traveling companions, all piled up and unconscious while you were left to be unable to save them. Steamy, squelching darkness soon surround your head as you trailed into a muscled ring to push your exhausted body into the Scizor's stomach.

----

The Scizor patted his red shelled belly as it bloomed outward for a nice, round dome. The reptile wriggled and wobbled about inside the organ, whimpering to pleasure the bug leader's victory. He raised an arm up into the air, snapping his claws, "The Rampardos has failed! You may feast upon on the others in the pile, my fellow insects!"

The Scythers wailed in happiness, quickly flying over to make sure they could collect a whole body for themselves to swallow down. The Scizor rested back into a stone throne chair, letting the Rampardos inside his gut kick meekly at the stomach walls during his nestling rubs, listening to his opponent's pathetic cries. "If only you had been stronger, then I would've let you and your friends completely free, but I do not simply let loose easily caught meals for the ferals to get. We put the likes of you to good use and digest you ourselves!" The acids begin to pour over the curled up dino, who already started to pass out within the blending soup of enzymes.
15311111211111211111111.title: Defeated

15311111211111211111112.content:
"What?!" His eyes went wide as takes a face full of Flamethrower! He falls backward as the crowd gasped from the sneaky trick that you did as you get up. "That was too close for comfort..." You muttered as you look over at the scizor who's suffering a burn from the Flamethrower. "Well sir, do you submit?" The scizor sighed admitting defeat "Yes. I can see now that you're strong. You and your friends can leave our den without any worry of attack. A scyther flew in and handed the leader with a rawst berry to cure the burn as you nod "Thank you sir." You look over your friends and the haxorus and marrowak. You could use all the help you could get so you drag them along.

You managed to leave the scyther clan as a dark green male follows you and you turned around "Huh? What are you doing?" He chuckles a bit as he helps you drag your friends to a safe spot. "Well after seeing you defeat the elder, which no one has ever defeated, I wanted to see how strong you can get. I'm no slouch when it comes to fighting as well. Please take me with you!" You chuckle a bit as you shake his scythe "Of course you can. I'm Zeke." The scyther smiled "I'm Xio."

"...o...? ....a.... ....or...a... Fl....a...." The nidoqueen slowly opened her eyes and saw you staring into her amber eyes as she smiles "Zeke..." She looks over at Xio and gasped as got into a defensive stance and the scyther got into an offensive stance as you chuckle a bit "Whoa... Flora relax. We're out of scyther territory." She blinks a few times and sighs a bit "Oh... That's good to know... But now we don't know where the grumpig could be...?" You sighed a bit as a voice speaks up "Did you say grumpig!?" You look over and noticed that the haxorus and marrowak are up as you nod a few times "Yeah we did." The marrowak gasped as he rushed over to you "You know where Odie is?!" You shake your head a few times "No we don't know..." The marrowak sighed a bit "Oh... I thought for sure he was here..." Wes stretched out a bit as he looked around "Oh sweet arceus that hurt like a bitch!" He rubbed his back a few times as he looked over at the newcomers "Zeke are these guys coming too? That would be nice to move as a group. You nod a few times "Yeah these guys are coming with us. Maybe their friend Odie might know something about the infected." The haxorus nods "Oh Odie knows alright. We got separated when an infected ursarang attacked us! Oh! I'm Clyde and the marrowak's Ion." Mark groaned a bit as he rubbed his head a few times "Is it time for lunch yet?" Flora snicked a bit as she heard that. You smiled a bit as you stepped forward "Alright everyone, let's find Odie!"

+ Xio the scyther, Clyde the haxorus and Ion the marrowak joined your party! +

The scyther smiled as he heard that, and all of you head into the village.

At the village, some of the pokemon were preparing themselves for a fierce battle. You rejoin Clyde and Ion as they're talking with a Steelix naga who was towering thirteen feet tall with an additional ten feet with his long sliver tail behind him. "Oh? They could help us out with our problem." Wes steps toward the steel serpent "What's the problem?" The steelix sighed a bit. "We're in a battle with some infected ground types that live north from here. At first it was just one sneaking around, but they've concentrated with their numbers and hit us hard. We could use all the help we can get for this next attack. They're gonna give everything they've got to try to get a meal!" Wes looks over to you "Well Zeke, what do we do?" You rub your chin a few times before replying...

I'm Zeke, and this his my friend Flora." The poison type smiles as she waves to him. "So what kind of ground types are we dealing with?" You ask while Flora and the others get ready for the infected invasion. The large steelix makes a small sigh, "... We're dealing with Excadrill and Quagsire..." You blink a few times as you hear that, but you shrug it off since you were helping them out. "Don't worry, we'll do our best to drive them out." Zinc chuckles a bit as he heard that. "That's good to know. Devouring them wouldn't hurt as well." You nod a few times as you pad over to Flora and she giggles a bit and gives you a small hug. "We couldn't do anything for our village when the infected came, so let's give it our all with protecting this one!" You nod as you hold her hand and shake it a few times.

With an hour passed by and everyone was ready to get the fight for this village's safety, but it looked like there wasn't anything coming from the surrounding area. "It's quiet... Too quiet..." Xio muttered as a Poliwrath pads in from the south. "They're coming! Infected Quagsire coming from the river west from here! Excadrill are coming from the east!" Zinc nods a few times "Alright everyone! Split up and take them out!" Flora puts her hand on your shoulder "I'll go wherever you go Zeke." Mark nods a few times "Me too!" You nod a few times. "Alright guys... Let's go..."

With that said your party head out of the village but have no idea to where Odie could be...

You rub your chin a few times as Clyde and Ion argued with which path they should go with and then Flora interrupts them "Hey! Why don't we let our leader Zeke decide our route." You take a moment to look ahead and see that the path to the left leads to a plains while the path to right leads to a cave. You then shout...

You nod a few times as you lead the group on the path as Xion flies over to a dirt patch "Hey guys! Take a look at this!" You pad over to it and spot footprints and say "Nice job Xion! Footprints!" Clyde ad Ion both gasp as they take a closer look at the prints and Ion shouts "Those are Odie's! We must be on the right track now!" You nod a few times as you reply "Let's not waste any time!"

You head on head and noticed a large boulder blocking your path and you look around as Flora pads over to you "What's wrong Zeke?" She asked as places a hand on your shoulder. You look over to her and reply "Well I just remembering what Wes said about-" Before you could finish a loud scream was heard and the rest of your party rushed over to you. "W-what was that noise!?" Mark inquired as he panted a bit. You rub your chin and think about what Wes said and that might be a trap to lure prey. You look at the other and reply...

The tyranitar groaned a bit "It's because I've seen this happen before and I think we should tread lightly." You nods a few times as some rustling from some grass could be heard and you turned around a blast of Supersonic could be heard but it didn't affect you, Wes, Flora or Xion but everyone else got confused from it and started to attack each other

Wes launched a dark pulse at the path of grass revealing the attackers to be fat infected Explouds and standing around eight feet once they got up from the blast. There were seven of them but three of them were knocked out from Wes' attack and they charged at your party. You got ready to fight as you launched an Ancient Power at one of them!
153111112111112111111121111111.title: Ambushed!

Your Ancient Power hits the mark and you feel the stat boost from its secondary effect and Wes shouts out to you and Flora "Jump!" You tilt your head a bit before realizing that the Tyranitar was going to use Earthquake! You and Flora jump when Wes stomps the ground and unleashing an Earthquake that shakes the ground and the Exploud off of their feet and Wes tackles the one closest to him and Flora looked over at you and Xion and say "We have to hurry! Now's our chance!" She charged at the second Exploud while Xion charged at the third one. You blink a few times but you then see what the three of them are doing and swallowing down the Exlpouds and you had to do the same. You take a deep breath and pounce the remaining normal type and stuffs its head into your maw. You could feel it roaring in your mouth and you swallow it down and stretch your maw around the infected-'s thick shoulders and chest forcing its arms to the side as it tried to squirm and thrash about almost knocking you off balance and you took your time with the large swell of a stomach and a few well timed gulps you take in the gut, legs and tail in one go. You hear thee loud burps and you reply with your own belch as Flora looked over "Ooh! Nice one~!" She giggled as she rubs her belly and Clyde, Mark and Ion snap out of confusion and noticed that your party was stuffed and Wes chuckled a bit as he points to the knocked out infected and say "There are a few more if you guys want." The three nod as the jumped Explouds and swallowed them down.

You let out a small groan as you felt your prey squirm about inside the belly and Wes chuckled a bit "Don't worry Zeke. You'll get used to it. Then again maybe you won't." You chuckled as Flora yawned a bit "I don't know about you guys but I'm tired..." You yawn yourself as he looked over at Mark, Clyde and Ion seeing them already asleep with large bulging bellies and you stretch out a bit "A little rest wouldn't hurt right?" The others nod and lied on your back and drifted to sleep letting your belly digest the infected trapped inside you. "Zzz..."
1531111121111121111111211111111.title: Gulping down a live one

15311111211111211111112111111111.content:
You get up from the grassy ground as you let out a loud burp and pat your belly a few times as it had worked your prey to nothing more that belly fat and you make a small stretch getting your body ready for this day and Clyde and Ion were already awake and spotted some more footprints "Hey guys! We're getting close to where Odie could be at!" Everyone else was waking up and waddled over to them as the footprints of a Grumpig could be seen and a Machoke's footprints as well. "You think the Machoke helped him?" You asked but Wes replied after pointing to an Ursarang's track "We can't be to sure about that. Let's hurry. The sooner we find him the sooner we have to an explanation about this crisis!" Your party nod and follow the footprints as another scream was heard and Clyde and Ion's eyes went wide as they shout "That's Odie's voice! We gotta hurry!"

Your party rushed over and see the Grumpig stuck between a Hippowdon, a Kangaskhan, a Machoke and an Ursarang. You were too far away to tell if they were infected or not but Clyde and Ion rush at the group as they cried "Odie! We've come to help you!" The Grumpig make a sigh of relief as he waves over to them "Thank Arceus your here! Please help me...."
15311111211111211111112111111111.title: Getting close to Odie

153111112111112111111121111111111.content:
Clyde blinked a few times before getting knocked away from Odie by the Ursarang "You stay out of this!" He roared "This little piggy is our infected bait! We've been having good luck with him and you're not gonna take him us without a fight!" You stepped forward and stared at the group as you shout "Since we out number you how about a duel for Odie the Grumpig. If I win you give us Odie." The Machoke steps forward and smirks "But if I win then we get to take four of your party members!!" You sighed a bit knowing you were at a disadvantage in type paring but Odie had some valuable information and it was vital to Clyde and Ion. " Alright I accept the terms of the duel!" The Machoke smirked as he heard that and said to his group "Excellent... Alright boys! Leave this overgrown lizard to me!" You looked over at your party as Ion was very nervous while Clyde growled a bit and you called out "I'll do my best!" Flora waved with her arms "Good luck Zeke!"

You looked over at Machoke and started the duel off with Ancient Power but the fighting type blocked the attack and counters with Low Kick and trips you and land on your back. The Machoke chuckles as he throws a Mach Punch as you get up and knocking you back. The tall humanoid laughed as you struggle to get up "Is that all you got?" He asked mockingly as you managed to get on your feet "No! I still have some stream!" The Machoke laughs more as he starts to concentrate and you take this this chance to launch a Flamethrower at him and...
153111112111112111111121111111111.title: Mano a Mano

1531111121111121111111211111111111.content:
The Machoke lets out a loud howl as the stream of flames hit him and break his concentration. You decide to keep up the momentum and ram his gut with a Zen Headbutt and he lets out a low grunt as he holds his gut and flinches leaving himself open as you slam another Zen Headbutt at his skull and he falls over as you pant a few times "Hah... Hah... Had enough yet?" The fighting type groaned weakly realizing that getting a Focus Punch was his fatal mistake and you pummeled him to the ground and he lets out a defeated sigh. "Yes... I give up... Please have mercy on this foolish brute such as myself." You rub the back of your head and make a sheepish chuckle "Of course I'll have mercy. Since that means I've won will you keep your end of the deal?" The Machoke staggered onto his feet and nod as your party cheer while the superpower pokemon's group were shocked from their leader's loss and released Odie from their grip. You watched the Machoke limp over to his group and said "Come on guys. There's plenty more pokemon out there that can replace the pig." They nod and leave the area as Odie, Clyde and Ion gave a huge group hug and cried for a bit. Flora giggled a bit from the reunion as Mark gags from it.

The Grumpig pads over to you and smiled "Thank you very much for saving me. What's your name?" You smile back and reply "My name's Zeke." Odie then stares deep within your eyes for a while and chuckles a bit "I've see you've been through much." You tilt your head as you hear that "How do you know that?" Odie chuckled a bit "Oh that's simple. I had to devour a Xatu that was in the verge of being infected. I'll explain more as we head back to my home that's near a lake and north from here." You nod a few times and you and party head north to hear Odie's story.
1531111121111121111111211111111111.title: The tables turn!

choices: Your party arrive at Odie's home
15311111211111211111112111111111111.content:
Odie makes a huge sigh as he looked at everyone at your group and then started to speak "The whole incident that started about three years ago in near a cave called the Aurora Caverns. Three legendary psychic type pokemon lived there and practiced their power. A Cresselia, A Mew and a Deoxys... These three would often find ways to communicate with other pokemon and often take them in to test if they were worthy. I went to the caverns with a Gardevoir, a Xatu and a Hypno to see if the rumor of gaining strength was true but what we didn't know that the caverns hold a terrible secret to it... When we followed the three legendaries deep into the cave there a black crystal... And it held a dark power... Cresselia told us not to touch it but Hypno was very curious about the gem and touched it... A very sinister voice spoke to me and gave me horrible chills 'This world shall fall into chaos...! Let loose your wild instincts and you will survive!' I was mixed with fear and confusion with what that voice was talking about but it became clear when Gardevoir started to attack Deoxys and Hypno and the gem were nowhere to be found... Mew then teleported me and Xatu out of the cave as he let out sharp shriek as he dropped to the ground and holding his head. His eyes started to glow a faint purple and he asked me to eat him. I didn't have much of choice seeing that Gardevoir had the purple eyes too... While I was digesting the large bird I've noticed that pokemon were going crazed and hungry... Some of them even seek for pleasure...! Before I left the entrance to the Aurora Caverns I heard an eerie screech. It echoed throughout the area and drove those couldn't resist to go crazy or infected in other words! I've also noticed the infection can spread to others in two different ways; one, the infected rapes their victim and releasing their seed into them. Two the infected bites a terrified victim, sending the infection into their bodies...!"

You blink a few times and ask the pig "Isn't there anyway to cure the infected pokemon?" Odie makes a disappointed sigh and replied "I wish there was but I was lucky that Clyde and Ion had strong wills otherwise I'd be in big trouble." You smiled a bit and rubbed your chin a few times "Well I'm not gonna give up on the search! Let's go to Odie's home!"
15311111211111211111112111111111111.title: Infected History 101

153111112111112111111121111111111111.content:
You managed to arrive at Odie's home and you couldn't help but wonder about the Grumpig's story. What was the beast that spread the infection and how are you gonna cure it? Those questions were gonna be answered if you and your friends press on. The Grumpig stops at his front door and chuckled a bit. "Please wait here everyone. I'll be back in a few minutes." He said and goes inside. You and your group look at each other as Mark speaks out "Well now what do we do?" You rub your chin a few times and reply "Well at least we know where the source of the problem is. But I think finding a cure is a higher priority." Flora nods a few times as she says "Zeke's right. We've got to find a cure as soon as possible." Wes looks at everyone and makes a slight shrug and replies "I think we should find a few more strong allies. We'll have a better chance to surviving this mission if we do." You nod a few times and reply "That's a good idea. Strength in numbers and all."

"Oh you're going to look for some more companions on you little journey are you?" Odie spoke out as he comes out of his home with a bag filled with oran, sitrus, pecha, rawst and leppa berries. "How about we go to Lextion Plateau? That spot usually has tournaments going on to see who's strongest." Ion and Clyde tilted their heads and say simultaneously "...We?" Odie smiled and replied "I'm going with you like it or not." You chuckle a bit and speak "Alright then. Let's all go to Lextion Plateau!"

+ Odie the Grumpig has joined your party!
153111112111112111111121111111111111.title: Gathering Supplies

choices: You and Flora catch up but something blocks the way!
1531111121111121111111211111111111111.content: You and your party arrived at a cross way and two of the roads lead to different areas while the third one lead to your destination. Clyde rubs the back of his head and replied "Well... Which way is it to Lextion Plateau?" Odie chuckles a bit as he steps to the northeast path "It's this way. Everyone follow me please." He said cheerfully as he pranced along the path as Flora gives you a weird look "Should we follow him?" You make a small sigh and say "He's quite wise and I don't think he'll steer us into trouble. We attract trouble anyway." Flora giggles a bit and nods "You're right about that Zeke." When you look over you see that everyone else went head leaving you and Flora!
1531111121111121111111211111111111111.title: Road to Lextion Plateau

choices: the big oaf lied there and went back to sleep.
the big oaf is awake and hungry!
15311111211111211111112111111111111111.content: You noticed that everyone had came to a stop as a bridge was blocked off by a large fat Snorlax and his unnaturally large stomach as it makes it a loud gurmble alternating with his snoring. Odie rubbed his chin a few times as he looks at the overweight pokemon. "Oh dear... Nothing seems to be working." Ion groaned as he give large oaf a swift kick to the belly as it jiggles and grumbles louder unnerving everyone. You look around and make a small sigh "We'll have to find away around the snorlax." Odie looks over you and nod "It looks like we'll have to. Luckily a short detour through Lucid Forest should get us to Lextion Plateau with not to much day." You nod a few times as you start to walk off when a large yawn could be heard and everyone froze and slowly turned around to see...
15311111211111211111112111111111111111.title: A large Snorlax

153111112111112111111121111111111111111.content: The Snorlax started to stretch its arms and legs out as it yawned... Only to set them down and drift back to a deep sleep. Wes shuddered a bit from that shock and said "Damn... For a moment there I thought we were end up in that belly." You blink a few times and look at the Tyranitar and said "I didn't think it would wake up after that long yawn it did." Odie nod and turns around and walks forward as he calls "Well we can't waste anymore time! Let's hurry to Lextion Plateau past Lucid Forest!" Everyone nods as they make their way to the forest as you thought about what kind of pokemon to look for... Many species and their abilities and types... You'll figure it out as you arrive at the forest where the leaves are so clear that you see right through them!
153111112111112111111121111111111111111.title: Whew!

1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.content:
You couldn't believe what you were seeing... The leaves were so clear... So shiny... It almost mesmerizing to watch them as Wes calls out to you "Hey! Just because something is beautiful doesn't mean it's safe!" You blink a few times as you look over at Wes and nod a few times "Your right... We got a mission to finish." Wes grinned after hearing that follows the group as you stagger behind and couldn't help looking at the leaves and some of the transparent plants. Mark was having the same admiration of this forest as you bump into him and both of you yelp at the same time. "Oh! Sorry Mark..." The beartic chuckles a bit as he pats his fat belly a few times "Nah don't worry about... Uh-oh..."

You blink a few times as you noticed Mark looking around frantically before back at you "We've lost the others! WE'RE LOST!!" You quickly grabbed the ice bear by the chest and smack his face a few times shouting "Cool it! Do you want to attract predators?!" Mark blinks a few times as makes a small whimper and curls into ball. "We might as well have... There's no way that anyone will notice we're gone...! We're horribly screwed...!" You make a small sigh and look at Mark as you pat him on the head saying "We'll get outta here. Just stay positive." Mark groans as he looks at you "I don't think it could possibly get any worse..." You blink a few times as you hear some rustling from some leaves but the figure's kinda hard to make out... As it comes closer to turns out to be...
1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.title: Inside the Lucid Forest

1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.content:
You make a sigh of relief as you saw Flora and Xio and walk over to them as the Nidoqueen hugged you tightly "Oh Zeke! I was worried that a Scolipede got you...!" You blink a few times and shudder a bit "There's Scolipede in this forest?!" You blurt out. She nods a few times and replies "Yes... What's worse is that these guys aren't even infected and very territorial." Xio nods a few times before getting bear hugged by Mark as he cries "Oh thank Arceus! We're SAVED!" "...Hug... crushing... limbs... Mark..." The Scyther squeaked out as Mark has him in a vice grip and finally lets go once you slapped his face with your tail "Whoa Mark! Don't crush our rescuers." You say as Flora giggles a bit and leads you and Mark back to the group once Xio recovered from Mark's death grip.

The others were rubbing their heads as Odie was on the ground with face down and a large bump on the top of his head. You gasped as you saw the Grumpig eating dirt as you ask "What the hell happened here?" Clyde turned at you and responded "Well we were going on the right path when an aspear berry fell from one of the trees and knocked him out cold...! We're worried that it given Odie amnesia." You rubbed your chin a few times and make a small sigh "That could be a problem if he lost his memory." Mark became unnerved from that statement and whimpered "B-but... Me and Zeke were already lost once..." Wes rolled his eyes and spoke "We won't be lost. We'll just have to wait for the pig to come around..." You and the others reluctantly nod and waited...
1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.title: Regrouping

1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.content:
Nnngh... Wha...? What happened...? Ow... Something hit my head hard... Wait.. What's that? Oh... It's Lexiton Plateau! Looks like things haven't changed there are a lot of powerful pokemon there... Oh? There's Zeke... and... A Zebstrika... He looks promising... And he won the tournament.. But... Now everything's... Purple! Oh dear!! There are Muk everywhere! They've surrounded the plateau! But wait... Now the Zebstrika is... trying to help... But... Oh... Now its just hazy... Whatever hit my head gave me a vision of the future... Must have triggered my Future Sight. Oh this pain in my head! D'oh forget about that I need to tell the others about what I saw!

You make a small yawn as a muffled moan came from the ground. Clyde and Ion gasped as they looked at the downed Grumpig as he jumped from the ground and then holds the top of his head as he cried "Ouch! That was a d-oozy!" The two companions hugged Odie as they say simultaneously "Odie! You're okay!" The pig chuckled a bit as he hopped backwards after hugging back "Thank you but I've got something to tell you guys! I just had a vision!" Clyde and Ion gasped and sat down "Oh wow! What did you see?" Clyde asked and Odie chuckled a bit replied "Well it starts off with us arriving at Lextion Plateau. Zeke then encounters a Zebstrika. The electric type then wins the tournament but suddenly a pack of Muk invade the area and outnumber everyone! The zebra then helps with fighting them off and.... That's all I saw." Wes rubs his chin a few times "Interesting... Looks like we'll have to be ready once we get to Lextion Plateau." You a few times as you say "Ok guys! Let's gear up and roll out!"
1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.title: Strange Vision

1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.content:
You take a look at a large stretch of land as you come out of the flashy forest. Not much could be said about it but Odie chuckles a bit as he steps onto the ground "Here we are! This is Lexiton Plateau! The tournament is taken place in the heart of the area. I'm sure we'll run into the Zebstrika there." You nod a few times as you follow Odie along the smooth area while the others were busy with talking to each other as you start to daydream... You couldn't help but remember hanging out with Flora and couple of other youngsters when you were a little Cranidos but the thought suddenly vanishes as you noticed that you were alone... Either everyone went ahead of you or your trip down memory lane drifted you away from them.

You make a small sigh as you feel something hitting your back and you yelp from surprise, quickly turning around to see that it was a Zebstrika! Glancing at the electrified zebra you could tell he was a little chubby and stood about your height wearing only a pair of black shorts. "Hey!" He shouted at you "Why don't you watch where you're going!? You're gonna make me late for the tournament! I'm not gonna let some lizard derail me from my destiny!" Before you could say anything the electric type zipped off and leaving a dust trail. You make a small sigh and decide to follow the dust trail since it could lead you back to your group.
1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.title: Meeting a Cocky Zebra

choices: Time to switch to the Zebstrika's point of view!
1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.content: You arrive at the a large chamber created from granite and gravel with various pokemon looking on and cheering. You look on in awe from all of the pokemon that were coming from the area as a Rhyperior steps in front of you and asks "Are you a fighter?" You blink a few times and shake your head as you reply "No sir. I think I got lost from my friends." The large drill pokemon glares at you when a familiar voice calls out "It's all right! He's with me." You look over and see that it's Odie and the Rhypeiror sighs a bit "All right then Odie. Make sure you keep an eye on them!" The Grumpig nods a few times as he chuckles "Of course Flint. I'll be sure to watch them." You decide not to say anything and follow Odie as he asked "What happened? I thought you were at the back of the line." You sigh slightly and replied "I was lost in my memories..." You shake your head and added "I was lucky that I follow a Zebstrika's dust trail otherwise I wouldn't have found this place." Odie smiles as he hears that "Ah so you have ran into the zebra. So how was he?" You groaned a bit as you replied "Arrogant and obnoxious." The Grumpig nods as he leads you to the others as you along the entrants to see along with the Zebstrika, there are fifteen others. A Smarrot, a Venomoth, an Emboar, a Walrein, an Octillary, a Crawdaunt, an Electivire, a Drapion, a Bastiodon, a Tauros, a Herracross, an Infernape, a Kingdra, a Krookodile and an Archeops. You managed to make out that all of the entrants are male. You shrug a bit and decide to keep an eye on the Zebstrika.
1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.title: At the Tournament

1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.content: The Zebstrika stood tall and with pride. He looked up at the arena master, who is a Machamp, as he stepped down from his spot and to the sixteen fighter before calling out "Today is the third annual tournament of Lexiton Plateau! The rules are simple here. The fighters can use anything in the arena to weaken their opponent. The victor is the one that devours his opponent and the defeated forfeit their lives. These proud fighters know what they're risking to get to the top! Now as you can see each one of our gladiators are on a circle. His opponent is the one with the same color. Victors will take breaks and drink from the sacred water to speed up digestion. The first round is Len the Krookodile versus Barrel the Archeops! The others must wait outside of the fight grounds!" The Zebstrika groaned a bit as he stops down but he looks at the Samarrot as he looks back smirking "Why the long face Pastry?" The electric zebra growled loudly as he heard that "Hey! It's Patrick not Pastry!" The water laughs as he gives him a lick "Your flavor tells another story. Can't wait to feel you squirming my cauldron of a stomach! Ha ha ha!" Patrick grumbled a bit as he watched his foe walk off so he tries to take his mind off by either resting or observing the others' fights.
1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.title: Tournament Rules and Brackets

1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.content:
Patrick shrugs a bit as he decides to watch his foes to see what they have in store. The two fighters stare off before Len starts off with getting close to Barrel to deliver a nasty Bite on his tail but the stone bird jumps back barely avoiding getting bitten. Barrel growls a bit as he leaps into the air and flew directly at the ground gator and hitting him with an Aerial Ace! Len groans a bit as he got up on his feet before he tried to attack with Sludge Bomb! The Archeops lets out a loud squawk before blocking the large purple globs from hitting his wings. He pants a few times before he charged at the Krookodile with U-Turn. Len lets out a low grunt as the attack hits him.

Len growls a bit as he charges at Barrel with a Brick Break hitting the rocky bird on his head causing him to stumble as he lets out a low groan. The ground/dark type smirked as he crossed his arms "What's the matter birdbrain? Loosing steam?" Len knew very well about Barrel's Defeatist ability so he thought he had this battle in the bag as he charged at the Archeops when...
1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.title: Let's watch!

1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.content:
This caught Len off guard as he charged head first into Barrel's gaping maw and churring from the gator's foolish move of attacking him head on when he weakened. The Krookodlie flailed and struggled to pull his head loose but he couldn't! How it this possible!? His Defeatist ability should be cutting his strength in half! Len thought as he felt his shoulders and chest slip into Barrel's maw. The crowd watched in awe as the match was in the sand gator's hand but it flipped over on its back and the rocky reptile had its grip on his struggling prey as he swallowed down the Krookodile's belly and legs letting those kick about for a moment before slurping them down completely and giving out a loud burp. "Heh... That gator failed to realize that I trained my to swallow strong prey even when my ability is active." Barrel chuckles as he drums his squirming bulging stomach.

The machamp chuckles a bit and shouts "Barrel the Archeops is the winner! Now it's time for the next match! Fizzon the Kingdra versus Dustin the Infernape!" Patrick looked over at Barrel and groaned a bit as he stumbles past him and the fighers went to the ring to start their fight.
1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.title: Reversal!

choices: Fizzon panics and opens his maw!
Dustin colides making a large explosion!
1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.content:
Fizzon looked over at Dustin with uneasiness and he makes a small swallow before the burning ape called out "If you're not gonna make the first move then I will!" And the Infernape charged at the large seahorse with a Mach Punch and hitting Fizzon in the gut and he gets pushed back a bit from it. Oh man... How am I gonna block his attacks if I don't have any arms...? Wait... Maybe this can help... The kingdra takes a deep breath and fires a Smokescreen at Dustin's face and the ape hollers and hoots as he tries to wipe the smog off of his face and the large sea horse takes advantage of that and fires a Hydro Pump at the Infernape's chest and knocking him back a few feet. "Oh...! I-I'm sorry about that... Are you ok?"

Dustin growls as he hears that "Am I ok? YOU BLASTED ME WITH A HYDRO PUMP YOU BASTARD!!!!" The ape burst into flames and charged in with a Flare Blitz and Fizzon's eyes went wide as he saw the ape's Blaze charged rage and...
1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.title: A Timid Kingdra and a Hothead

1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.content:
"Eep!" Fizzon squeaked as he was terrified with Dustin's attack and without thinking he opens his circular maw as he could before the ape flew right into it with fire and all! The Kingdra's eyes went wide as he saw smoke coming out of his maw and lets out a weak muffled whimper as the Infernape realized what had happened... He flew right into the giant seahorse's maw and is now trapped inside! The fire/fighting type growled and started to thrash inside Fizzon's bulging cheeks. H-he's struggling now... I guess there's no other way around this... Fizzon closed his eyes and makes a loud swallow and the bulge in his cheeks rolled down his throat and into his stomach as he lets out a loud burp "Oops... E-excuse me..." Dustin lets out a loud roar as he thrashed inside the Kingdra's belly.

The Machamp chuckled a bit as he saw Fizzon standing there with his gut writhing and pounding "Ha ha! Let's hear it for Fizzon! And now for our next match! Orsin the Herracross and Bull the Taruos!" Patrick chuckled a bit as he watched the shy seahorse pad off to sleep of the spicy meal and the beetle and bull walk into the ring. Bull was very muscular while Orsin was a little chubby. This should be interesting... The zebra thought as he looked at the match.
1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.title: Oops! Sorry...

choices: burst causing the rocks to scatter!
1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.content:
The two fighters stare each other down when Bull bellows out "Bull will crush you chubby beetle! Bull will put you in two worlds of hurts! One with my fists and the other is with Bull's stomach!" Orsin groaned as he rolled his eyes Oh great... I'm stuck with the retard in this match... He thought as he makes the first move by charging in and attacking with Close Combat. The Tauros blocked the continuous attacks and retaliates with Strength and throws a punch at the Herracross' chest knocking him back a bit. Bull laughs as he stares at Orsin with a cocky smile on his face. "Ha ha ha! You should give up now and Bull will show mercy when Bull swallows you down little bug!"

Orsin growled a bit as he heard the Tauros taunting him and he starts to concentrate by doing Swords Dance and Bull watches this dance and starts to Work Up to build his strength and he keeps a sharp eye on the beetle. Orsin then shouts out "Let's see how it feels to be buried in a ton of rocks!" He unleashes Rock Slide and rocks with various shapes and sizes fall on top of Bull and covering him in the rubble! After a while the pile starts to shake and...
1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.title: The Beetle and the Bull

1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.content:
Orsin smiled as he saw the rock pile stopped moving and he pushed away at the rocks until he saw Bull's face and grinned deviously "Not so good when you're at the mercy of someone else is Bull?" He asked mockingly as Bull growled and struggled in the pile "Just wait till Bull get Bull's arms loose! You'll be sorry you messed with Bull!" Orsin groaned as he grabbed the Tauros' head and replied deviously "Oh I'll be sorry alright... I'll have to deal with your meaty body! Time to change your name from Bull to Bulge and then to Shit!" He opens his maw wide and stuffed Bull's head into his maw and started to swallow. He murrs softly as he works in the broad shoulders and the thick massive chest. All Bull could do was make pointless complaints and struggles that were pointless as the beetle slurps in the rest of Bull's body like a thick noodle.

Orsin smirked as he drums his hugely bulged stomach "And with that Bull had left the building folks! Thank you and see you next -URP- round! He pads off the arena dragging his enormous writhing bulge with muffled bellows coming from it. The Machamp claps a few times and says "These matches know how to keep the hype! Now the next match! Rook the Bastiodon versus Seth the Drapion!" Patrick looked over at the Herracross as he struggled with thrashing belly and then at the two combatants Rook was very fat and each step that the steel/rock type did would shake the ground a bit. Seth was well in shape and the two were standing the same height but Seth had to deal with his taur belly and hind legs. The two stare at each other before the match starts.
1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.title: Bull Becomes Beetle Belly

1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.content:
Orsin's eyes went wide as the rocks scatter and some were hitting him hard. The Heracross gasped as he saw Bull was hardly hurt "Little bug has to learn... Bull had endured much harsher Rock Slide than yours... Compared to those this was almost nothing!" Bull looked down at Orsin who was panting and covered in bruises from the rocks "A little too garnished for Bull's taste but it will have to do." The Tarous then grabs the Heracross by his horn and tossed him high into the sky and he opens his maw as wide as he could. Orsin drops down like rock, lands in the bovine's maw and with gravity Bull takes one heavy swallow and the beetle was dragged down into Bull's stomach making his abs puff out, merging into one and bounces a bit. Bull chuckles a bit as he pats his round belly a few times "Bull hopes for a greater challenge in next round!" He said as he pads out.

The Machamp claps a few times and says "That Bull's gonna be one tough fighter to down! And now our next match! Rook the Bastiodon versus Seth the Drapion!" Patrick looks on as Bull walks along rubbing his belly a few times and then at the two combatants. Rook is like a sumo and sporting and very fat stomach that wobbled with each step and that step would shake the ground slightly while Seth was very fit his upper body was a little thick but down to his taur body the front and back legs were a bit thick and his second belly was slightly pudgy and they stood the same height as they stared each other down.
1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.title: Bull Gets a Snack

choices: Rook grunts and knocked to his back!
Rook's body jiggles and he still stands!
1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.content:
Seth starts off with Brick Break throwing attacking the Bastiodon's head but Rook bounces from the attack and uses his body to cushion the blow. He retaliates with a Flash Cannon and that hits the Drapion's face and he gets tossed for a loop. The large scorpion tries to attack with Brick Break aiming at Rook's enormous belly but it bounces off of the triceratops laughs from the gut wobbling from the impact "That tickles!" Seth's eyes went wide as he heard that and tried using Brick Break on Rook's chest... Nothing happens! He tries again and strikes his back... Same result. Rook grinned as he looked at the scorpion and chuckles "I call myself Rook for a reason! I'm a tower of fat that nothing can penetrate!" Seth started to sweat knowing that Cross Poison and Sludge Bomb wouldn't work and Ice Fang would tickle him. The Drapion growled as he stares at the triceratops "I will find a way to hurt you!"

Rook chuckled a bit "Tell you what. If you can knock me down with three moves I'll let you eat me. If you can't then I get to eat you." The Drapion blinks a few times from the Bastiodon words. Clearly he's confident that his defense won't be broken by him and he growls from the rock/steel type's arrogance. "Fine! I'll break through your defenses with three hits!" Rook grinned deviously as he watched Seth charge at him with a Brick Break hitting his chest... Nothing happens. Seth takes a few steps back and tries again with more momentum... Still nothing... Seth growls and backs up to the edge of the arena and charges froward and leaps into and slams the third Brick Break with all his might and....
1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.title: Offense vs Defense

1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.content:
Seth pants a few times as he looks at Rook who was lying on his back and was trembling in shock. I can't believe this! How did he break through my shield!? All of that training... All of the eating... It was all for nothing! If this shield can't prevent me from getting hurt I might as well be belly fodder! The Drapion looked at the Bastiodon who was still lost in his thoughts and the scorpion shrugs it off and starts to eat the triceratops feet first. With Rook's fat and blob like body Seth had a hard time swallowing all of the meat but after ten minutes of heavy swallowing he gets to Rook's belly. Seth groaned mentally but he had to press on with the swallows. Fifteen minutes past and the Drapion finally gulped down the belly and he takes advantage of his stretched maw to engulf the rest to the dino's body and make powerful swallow making his upper stomach bulge out grossly.

Seth pants a few times before letting out an earth shaking belch "Whew... I hope I don't have trouble with swallowing my opponents than fighting them." He rubs his overstuffed belly and he walks off of the arena. The Machamp chuckled from the dark/poison type's efforts "Look at that! Seth made quite a meal of Rook! Now for the next match. Justin the Electivre versus Terrence the Crawdaunt! Patrick looked over the Drapion as he waddled past him and then to the two fighters. Justin was just as muscular as Bull was but he had thick layer of fat on his gut. With Terrence he was very thick and the armor was flexible around the belly and muscles so he was like the electric type only fatter.
1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.title: Knight takes Rook

choices: but he was too late and was zapped by a Thunderbolt!
and lets loose the point blank Hidden Power!
1531111121111121111111211111111111111111.content:
Justin smirks as he looked over at Terrence for a bit but he smirks that he's up against a water type and he waits for the crab to make the first move. The Crawdraunt growls a bit before he starts his charge at the Electivre with his arms ready to slam a Crab Hammer.
