1553322211121122111.content:
The pokemon's eyes flashed with wicked intention as he trailed a finger across your side, wrapping a clawed hand around your tail. Wait, when did he get so close!?

You tried to tug your tail away, but you were too weak. He lifted its tip to his muzzle and slid it inside his mouth, your fur bristling as he slowly and deliberately sucked on it. "Mmm... I could tell from your delicious dreams that you'd be the same."

"Wh-What are you doing!? Get away from me!" You frantically tried to jerk and wriggle away, but he quite literally had the cat by the tail.

He chuckled, ignoring your demands. "How cute... I love it when my prey is bound and squirming." Before you had a chance to respond, he gracefully let go of your tail and snatched up your kicking legs. Opening his mouth, he easily slid your hindpaws inside, slathering them with hot drool as his lips closed around your ankles.

"Stop it, y-you freak!" You tried to kick away from him, but you were just too exhausted. This had to be some method of sick torture... Did these guys molest their inmates or something? That'd certainly explain why he tied you up. You shuddered as you could only imagine what he did to you while you were sleeping. "I'm sorry, alright!? Whatever this is, I'm not into it! Stop sucking on my paws!"

The Kadabra merely grinned around your ankles, slurping your pads in response, causing you a pained giggle. "Hmhmhm... You still don't get it, my deliciously clueless cat." You heard a smooth gulp and felt something tug at your toes, pulling them into a snug embrace. Stuffing your legs in further, the psychic pokemon moaned as he swallowed up to your knees. "I'm not merely fondling these exquisite limbs of yours... I'm making them my dinner." Another swallow brought you in up to your hips, his tongue lecherously slathering over your rump as it was pulled inside. Apparently, those wide cheeks of his weren't just for show.

"No... This is just some twisted joke!" You glared at him, halting your squirms as you now allowed him to manhandle you. You wouldn't let him have his fun anymore. "I'm not going to let you fool me."

The Kadabra stared deep into your eyes, huffing a steamy breath of air over you as he took another deep swallow. His lips were now stretching over your belly, tongue slurping at your back as you felt drool slowly dribble down the length of your tail. "I assure you this is no joke, my little morsel."

That gaze pierced right through your doubts and hit home; the next resounding gulp jolted you back into action. This was crazy, unbelievable--yet there was no denying the reality anymore. Not with his wet jaws clenching around your chest, teeth gently grinding against your skin. The sensation sent a sudden wave of fright through your being.

"D-Don't chew, please!" You weakly struggled as his tongue lapped at your arms, sending your paws into his hungry gullet.

"Why not? You told me to bite." It seemed as though the Kadabra was not above playing with his food. With another wet shlurk, you found your chin bumping against his nose. Shuddering, you squinted your eyes as he moaned around you again, his steamy breath washing over your face. "Ohhh, such a delectable slice of meat... I've always wanted Purrloin."

"Please..." You whimpered, your squirming but a mere wriggle now. "I'll do anything."

"Then get into my belly, where food belongs." With a smirk, the Kadabra pushed the rest of you into his slobbery maw, tongue reaching around to slather over your face before stuffing it into his throat. With a deep mmm, your body was sent downward to curl inside his hot gut. The walls gurgled and squeezed around you, forcing you into a ball of fur. You tried to push his stomach away, fighting your fate, but it was no good.

"Mmmmmm, yes! Keep fighting, you incredible creature! I love savoring everything about you..." Mewling weakly in defeat as your struggling died down, you were a pathetic mess of bruises and slobber. To make things worse, you knew this fiend would keep taunting you until the end. He only proved this fact by jabbing his fingers into his gut, squishing you around in his stomach. "Don't stop yet, you tasty thing! Squirm for me." His jostling caused you unwilling struggles, unable to resist his invasive prodding.

You soon tired out, though, the fight left in you gone for good. The heat was becoming more intense by the minute, drowning out the consciousness you had left. With one last whimpering mewl, you were done, food for the surprisingly ravenous guard.

****


The Kadabra picked a thread of hair from his lips, letting out a hardy belch as he seemed to consider something. Slipping the hair between his lips, he let out a moan as he gave it a long suckle. Faint, but still delicious... He slurped the last trace of you down into his gut to digest with the rest of his meal.

I hope more Purrloins come across our fort... He smiled, absently petting his belly bulge. Though, I will have to humbly request that the other guards leave them for me to handle.
1553322211121122111.title: "Let me show you what I mean."

choices: Well, let's get on with this raid.
1553322211122.content:
Figuring that nothing interesting would be posted, you headed toward the marketplace.

Upon arrival, you saw a decent number of merchants trying to hock their wares--it was easy to slide a few things into your bag without being noticed. A sitrus berry (should be useful), a few bluk berries (your favorite), a pair of black glasses (ohhhhh yeah)... Your bag was jostling with a variety of items by the time you were finished; the purrfect robbery. The merchants would never notice, and no one would be the worse for wear.

Just as you turned away to leave, though, the sound of alarms blared throughout the complex. A shiver ran down your spine as you remembered what outposts were known for: they were the common target of infected Pokemon swarms. The alarms could mean only one thing.
1553322211122.title: Reading is for schmucks! Ahem.

choices: Uh... I can try to help out?
Eek! Maybe I should hide behind someone else... People need support, right?
15533222111221.content:
You dashed across the complex, looking for signs of a shelter. There had to be one in a place like this!

You snagged the attention of an Arcanine who ran by. He looked guardly enough, perhaps he would know. "H-Hey! Do you know where the safe-house is?"

The canine looked down at him with a smirk and a snort. "Hah! There is no safe-house. When we have an emergency, all the Pokemon here help defend the fort. Didn't you read that on the message board?"

No, I guess not.

With a grimace, you watched as the Arcanine shook his head and ran for the gates. You had no clue what to do. Purrloins weren't battlers, particularly not you!
15533222111221.title: Buuut, hiding is more fun.

choices: Hurry, leap over the gate on the other side of the village!
No, it might be better to hide and wait this out...
15533222112.content:
Your paws crunched over the gravel as you made your way forward, heading toward Fulleaves Forest. It really was a shame to leave all those people behind, but there was nothing you could do. Sighing again, you stared skyward as an aloof glaze rolled over your eyes.

Your ears suddenly perked as you felt footsteps near you. Wait, not footsteps... The ground was rumbling! Your eyes darted forward, the site before you sending your fur straight up. All sorts of frog Pokemon came bursting out of the woods--Politoad and Croagunk, Seismitoad and Ivysaur, and all the ones between. A horde was a generously light term for this swarm of slavering behemoths.

You turned on your feet and dashed back toward the village. Surely, even a minute's notice might save a few people... However, it seemed as though the village watch were already ringing the emergency bells and closing the doors. Gotta be quick! You jumped between the doors just as they closed, barely keeping your own tail intact.

It seemed like you weren't the only one out of breath. The villagers were in a panic, a cacophony of unrest as they all scattered and squawked in every direction. From the way they barred themselves in their homes, you'd think they forgot they had wings... Then again, they were under assault by frog-type Pokemon. Pokemon with long, sticky tongues. Most of these birds have never even seen a battle in their life--they'd be easy to pluck right out of the sky.

Speaking of which, you'd be easier to pluck right off the ground. Deciding it was time to move for yourself, you twisted around to survey your options...and instantly felt like kicking yourself for being an idiot. You've trapped yourself in here with the lot of them. Groaning with a grit of your fangs, you picked what you thought would be your best chance at escape.
15533222112.title: This is why I don't like playing 'Telephone.'

155332221121.content:
You quickly ran to the other side of the fort, leaping onto the roof of a well and onto the top of the village wall from there. The sight that awaited you stopped you in your tracks: the entire village was surrounded by frog Pokemon. The crowd was filled with croaks and flailing tongues, the infected Pokemon clearly both excited and hungry. Perhaps the information on this raid wasn't exactly wrong... It just didn't truly encompass the severity of the situation.

You yeowled as a tongue flew right past your head. The shock nearly knocked you off the ledge, but you sighed in relief as you managed to keep your balance. You sighed too soon though, because the next thing you knew, a Seismitoad slammed its body against the shaky wall and sent you falling to the ground.

Unfortunately, you landed outside of the village. Cringing as you lifted yourself up, your heart sank as you saw beady eyes all around...focused on you. The teeming mass of hungry beasts was momentarily still, as if they were silently deciding who got to devour you. It didn't take long for the Seismitoad to step forward.

"This one is mine, boys."

The toad peered down at you with aggressive, hungry eyes, his tongue sliding out to teasingly lap over his curled lips. The gesture sent a shiver down your spine. "Please, I-I..!" You didn't have the chance to say anything more before the Seismitoad lunged, clutching its massively hefty hands around your entire torso, pinning your arms to your sides. A soft whimper left your lips just as his open maw dropped down upon you.

Squirm and writhe as you might, your predator was just too powerful. He suckled you in between his drooling lips like a fuzzy noodle, moaning around you as you slid over his sticky tongue. Considering the way he was slathering you up with his thick tongue, coating you in heavy and slimy frog slobber, you must have tasted pretty damn good. It wasn't long before your head was lodged into his throat, the tunnel pulsing and sucking you in deeper. You felt his hands leave you as his lips closed over your ankles... This was it.

With a few more thick glucks, the rest of your body slid over his tongue and into his throbbing gullet. The passage squeezed and tugged before depositing you into his steamy gut. The chamber gurgled and sloshed you about, compressing around your feeble body. Nothing but food now, cat.

The Seismitoad belched and smacked his gut, the jostling stomach being the last thing you felt before you fell unconsciousness.
155332221121.title: Maybe not the best idea...

choices: I'll try my luck with the lock.
The greedy bastard is probably hiding away in there. I'll find something else.
155332221122.content:
But where? Considering that the town was home to bird type Pokemon, there probably weren't very many cellars to lock yourself up in. The best you could think of was to hide in a pot, or a cupboard, or...

Wait! There was one place that could possibly do the trick. You weren't too sure about it, though. It's the vault of the mayor, the one you snuck into a few days ago. The greedy Honchkrow stockpiled loads of food and other goods in there as if he were preparing for the apocalypse (maybe he was...but rather, the frogocalypse). It was risky, though, because the mayor may have already locked himself up in there and barred it from the inside. Not only that, but you weren't sure if you had the time to solve the lock all over again--it had a very intricate design.

Looks like either option is pretty risky... But which poison to drink?
155332221122.title: Time to hide!

1553322211221.content:
You decided to go after the vault. After all, even if you can't manage to get inside, you might happen across another hiding spot that will do just fine.

You swiftly ran to the residence of the mayor: a luxurious, swooping great oak. You barged through the double-doors, not particularly caring who heard--now was not necessarily the time for secrecy. A look behind you was enough to light a fire beneath your rear. The infected Pokemon already broke through the main gates and were ravaging the village.

It seemed as though not a single soul was in the house. It was eerily quiet within, the only sounds coming from the shrieking commotion outside. The silence put you on edge, even as you reached the vault. The door was massive, imposing; not something you could ever even dream of smashing down without blowing up the entire tree. Well, time to get to work.

The vault required a combination and a key to get inside. You knew the combination (unless the mayor changed it since your break-in) but you didn't have the key. Additionally, the key had to be twisted a particular way each time you hit a combination number on the dial. The mayor sure was thorough when it came to locking up his own goods... Much more secure than he kept the city walls, apparently.I mean, seriously. Wooden walls? That's asking for trouble.

Shaking your distracting thoughts aside, you pulled your lockpick out of your satchel and stuck it into the keyhole. Putting your ear to the door, you carefully spun the dial until you heard the click of a successful number. Wriggling your lockpick in the right direction was more difficult, though, proving the whole operation to be quite time consuming.
1553322211221.title: To the mayor's house!

choices: Phew, the coast is clear! No mayor in sight.
15533222112211.content:
You've got it! The door clicked open, revealing the passageway within. You hastily shut the door behind you and made sure it didn't budge. Satisfied with your work, you breathed out a sigh of relief as you turned around.

A number of paths were laid out before you as an extra security measure; all but one of them led to dead-ends. However, you knew exactly which one led to the goods due to your previous visit here. Taking the second path from the right, you made your way towards the inner depths of the vault. There was no sign of the mayor yet... Hopefully he didn't have the same idea as you and flew the coup instead. There was no telling how he'd react to you breaking into his vault, even if it was for your own safety.
15533222112211.title: Seems the mayor didn't notice anything missing.

choices: Call out to see who it is!
155332221122111.content:
You eventually came to the room you were looking for. The hovel was round in shape, the ceiling curved to give the place a cozy sort of feel to it. The walls were filled with cubbies and shelves that were absolutely overflowing with items--a true haven for thieves and stow-aways. The only reason you didn't steal more than you did on your first visit was that you couldn't fit anything more into your bag.

After a quick survey of the area, you concluded that the mayor was not in the vault. Unless there was a secret passage, but you highly doubted such an unnecessary addition to this place. You plucked a bluk berry from one of the piles and popped into your mouth. All this excitement had left you quite famished, and you favorite snack was sure to hit the spot.

Time passed slowly for you, but there came a point where you heard a rapping in the distance. Like knocking... No, like thumping. Heavy thumping. You dropped the golden seed you were analyzing and dashed for the door of the vault to investigate.

Sure enough, there was a commotion at the door. Someone was trying to break in. Considering how obvious it was that no one could simply break through, you had to assume the assailant was either infected or just plain stupid. Or both.
155332221122111.title: Time to get cozy...Right?

1553322211221111.content:
"Is someone out there?" You shout, not caring if you revealed yourself. Even if you were talking to bad news, you were positive there was nothing that could force itself inside; on the other hand, if someone needed help, then perhaps you could provide a hand.

"Help! HEEEEEEELP!" Someone began squawking outside, your voice seeming to trigger faster, harder pounding.

"A-Alright, keep your voice down!" You wanted to help but you certainly didn't want to attract any unwanted attention. Fumbling with the lock for a moment, you pushed the door open a smidgen to admit whoever was outside. An animated Farfetch'd practically ran you over as she hustled inside--the pokemon clearly had more concern for herself than actual sense.

You'd been knocked to the ground as she rushed down one of the dead-ends of the vault, leaving you to deal with closing the door. With a heavy sigh and a shake of your head, you lifted yourself back up and began to pull on the handle. However, the door wasn't budging. You pulled and tugged, yanking on the door, but nothing was happening!
1553322211221111.title: Oi, stupid bird!

15533222112211111.content:
Hearing a throaty chuckle from above, your eyes shot upward. A Croagunk was sitting atop the hatch, pushing against the frame with a foot; that solved the mystery of the suddenly-immobile door. It seemed like he was having quite the lark over foiling your endeavors.

You backed away as the Croagunk dropped to the ground, leering at the wily critter while considering your options. There's not much to do with a bunch of dead ends... I guess locking yourself up isn't a good idea if you're just going to open the door.

Turning on your heels, you dashed in the direction of the Farfetch'd. Even though she seemed like a fairly useless pokemon, perhaps she'd have enough sense to fight when the situation called for it. You heard the Croagunk following close behind, taunting you with gurgling chuckles--it was obviously undeterred by having to chase you. It probably enjoyed this, in fact.

You twisted and turned until you finally found your destination. The bird pokemon was huddled into herself, undoubtedly trying to keep a low profile. Upon seeing you trailed by the Croagunk, she leaped up with an alarmed squawk, slamming her leek against the crown of your head. "FOOL, IDIOT, IMBECILE! You've led it right to me!"

"H-H-Hey! Save it for the actual enemy here!" You pushed her away as she repeatedly tried to smack you, cradling your throbbing head with a paw. She stopped with a huff, turning toward the Croagunk after shooting you a venomous glare.

"WELL, it looks like I'll have to help you get rid of this thing!"
15533222112211111.title: "Crrr-rr-rr-rr-rr-rr..."

155332221122111111.content:
The two of you faced off against the Croagunk as unlikely allies. Snickering at your battle-stances, the frog pokemon took a dauntless step forward. Does this guy find everything amusing?

You were fairly confident that you guys had the edge. While you'd obviously never worked together before, surely numbers had to count for something. All it would take to win this was some effortful strategy. "Alright, I'll-"

"HIEEEEEYAH!" The Farfetch'd recklessly dashed at the frog, leek in the air as it planned a strike. You groaned as you resisted the powerful urge to face-palm. The bird was easily smacked to the side by the Croagunk, not even getting a hit in before she crumbled to the ground.

You grimaced as your hopes were so easily dashed. Really? She fainted that fast? Either she was incredibly weak, or this Croagunk was nothing to mess with. Both possibilities were plausible. Standing your ground, you readied yourself as it turned its attention to you.

It rushed at you with a sudden, unexpected surge of energy; the frog must be getting hungrier. You tried to dodge but it managed to clip your side, stunning you long enough to toss another jab. His three fingers chopped right into your gut, causing you to double over, gasping for breath. Oh no...

You felt dizzy as some kind of venom began to flow through your body. The poison jumbled your awareness, swiftly disabling you from battling any further. You heard the Croagunk chortle as its shadow loomed over you, resting its hands on your shoulders; from its careless grip on you, you could tell that it had no concerns of your escape.
155332221122111111.title: Her help is as empty as her generosity.

1553322211221111111.content:
A flurry of colors swam around your head as a warm, moist breath of air wafted over you. The Croagunk slithered its tongue out of its mouth, curling the sticky appendage around your face as it began to taste you. It slowly rolled over your fur, slathering you with slimy drool, the frog pokemon taking all the time in the world to savor you. And why not, for you were completely at its mercy. You'd been trying to struggle but your limbs refused to move--you couldn't even twitch a finger.

The Croagunk let you fall to the ground as the poison set in deeper. This allowed it to explore more of your body, not just your head. His tongue slopped down your back and around your tail, reaching around to wetly caress your rump. Barely managing a whimper as he lifted your waist up by the tail, you felt the slimy thing push between your cheeks to sample that sensitive little pucker of yours. With the venom muddling your mind, it was easy for your body to override your fear and become aroused by the slimy sensation sneaking between your legs. Croagunk's toxins apparently didn't stop your blood from rushing to your cock, the little member hardening as it was coated in warm saliva.

The frog didn't mind what was going on against its tongue--in fact, it was enjoying the musky flavor rising from this particular spot on its meal. Grabbing your waist and clamping its lips over your rear like a cat sandwich, it let your member nestle into the soft, slimy folds of its tongue. The gooey mass throbbed against you as it worked against your cock, simultaneously smooshing and rubbing against your tailhole. Thick saliva was soon dripping from your body.

You completely forgot the situation in your senseless bliss. Blood seemed to pump through your cock just as intensely as the poison pulsing through your veins, though you couldn't even smile as you enjoyed yourself. But that didn't matter--all you knew was the powerful suction on your rear and that pleasurable, wet feeling at your crotch. You didn't have to beg for release too long, though, as another minute sent your cum spilling out over your chest and the frog's sticky tongue.

Moaning from the flavor exploding over its talented licker, the Croagunk was finally satisfied. With its food now dolloped with a helping of cream, it set to work with wrapping its lips further around you. A thick shlop could be heard as its drooling maw reached around your waist. You were still too overcome by pleasure to remember what was happening, though, and the steamy breath only made you feel all the cozier.

It wasn't long before your head was the only thing sticking out of the Croagunk's slimy mouth. It gave one more snigger as its tongue lathered your face in sticky frog drool, the tip pushing that delectable little head of yours inside. Lips sealed your fate as darkness consumed you, though the dancing colors behind your eyelids where the only thing you could see anyway. With another swallow your head was lodged in its throat, sliding down to fill up that hungry gut below.

Thick gurgles and groans filled your senses as the Croagunk's belly surged around you. Dazed and confused, you still had no idea what had happened as your consciousness swam away in the belly of the beast.

****


Letting out a heavy belch, the frog smiled as its breath smelled of bird and cat. The Croagunk relaxed as it rubbed over its distended gut, picking up the discarded leek to idly chew on the thing. Closing its eyes, the pokemon thought about all the satisfying thing's it got to taste today...and the meals it would have tomorrow.
1553322211221111111.title: Tasting a puddy tat~

choices: You reach the treasure room again, but this time you don't feel very successful.
1553322211221112.content:
The lock within the vault had begun to jiggle as it glowed oddly--a sight that was deeply unsettling. You backed away from the door, edging closer to prepare for an escape if necessary. What kind of frog pokemon was able to use psychic abilities...?

The lock clicked as the door swung open, solving the mystery: a Politoed and a huge Venusaur. The Venusaur nodded to its comrade, in what seemed like thanks, before letting out a thunderous roar. You felt the vibration through the entirety of your being, but the vibration didn't stop with the Venusaur's roar.

A crowd of voracious pokemon appeared behind the two, roaring and croaking in a cacophony of horror. Most had bellies already bulging, a few of which that were still squirming. Saying that you felt threatened was a massive understatement. The Venusaur stood among them, strong and imposing, and nearly as big as the doorway itself. Its minions were mere puppies in comparison to the great beast.

You'd seen enough, too much; you turned and ran. The rumbling began again as the horde followed you. You heard a terrible crash behind you as the Venusaur forced its way through the tunnel, shoving the debris away with ease. Your little paws carried you as fast as they could, pit-pat pit-pat, but you feared that your efforts would soon be a waste.
1553322211221112.title: A strange glow?

15533222112211121.content:
Your eyes frantically danced around the treasure room as you entered, looking for a place to hide. What else could you possibly do? There was no way you could win in battle against an infected horde, nor was it likely that you could slip away unnoticed with so many eyes. When an infected pokemon spotted prey, no matter how few or how small, it would hunt until it nabbed its mark or until it felt it no longer could. You'd have to hide and hope for the best... At least it was taking a while for the Venusaur to break through to you.

There were boxes and barrels, but they were all too small. The shelves weren't an option, either. You were sure that you could actually fit in those, but then there'd be nothing to conceal you--without cover, a frog would easily slurp you out of there. Your eyes finally came to rest on a large pile of berries. It wasn't the optimal hiding spot, but it would have to do.

You dove into the pile and burrowed your way inside. You were thankful that there were enough berries to topple in over the path you burrowed, effectively covering your tracks. You hit the corner between ground and wall and stopped. You nestled as comfortably as you could, remaining silent as you heard your stalkers crash through the threshold.

You could see nothing through the berries, but you could hear the frogs filling the room with their croaks. They must have been looking for you. You wished that you could shrink away, disappear...but unfortunately, neither of those abilities were in your skill set. You soon felt heavy footsteps slowly come toward you. Thump. Thump. Thump.

You sensed them stop right in front of the berry pile. Shuddering, you could hear the Venusaur's deep breath as the pile of berries began to rustle.

Oh, no. No, no, no, no..

Berries crunched and squished as the Venusaur began to devour the pile, slowly picking its way toward you. It couldn't possibly know you were in there. Yet, there was no other explanation--infected or not, it couldn't have possibly forgotten so quickly. It must have picked up that this was the only viable hiding spot in the whole room. You always thought that pokemon became nothing but dumb, senseless beasts once they were infected. Maybe you were wrong.

Light broke through as you heard a loud OHMPF over your head, fruit tumbling down around you. Berry juice dribbled over your head as you held back a whimper, forcing yourself to look up. Those imposing jaws of the Venusaur were munching away with the casualty of someone who was in no rush. Taking a deep swallow, the Venusaur tilted its head down to look directly in your eyes.
15533222112211121.title: Haste makes waste, after all!

155332221122111211.content:
Your eyes darted from side to side, looking for the exit you knew didn't exist. All you saw was the crowd of frog pokemon corralled around the Venusaur; it seemed like they revered the titan as some kind of leader, anxiously waiting for it to take in its meal.

You looked back up at the Venusaur. It grunted in approval as your gazes met again, as if it had been waiting to lock eyes with you before it fed. Hot breath rolled out as it opened its maw; you were given a detailed looked inside as it hovered over you, the egotistical bastard wanting to show off where you were headed. Its palate drizzled thick strands of drool over the tongue that began to slip beneath you, the slimy muscle rubbing against your fur. Berries tumbled from the remnants of the pile as the tongue curled around your hiding spot...some of which rolling right into the wide gullet before you. The colossal beast didn't even need to gulp.

You shivered as you felt your rump begin to slide down the Venusaur's wet tongue, darkness falling with its lips--that's when you turned and tried to frantically scramble back out of the steamy maw. Your paws caught nothing but the berries and slimy surface beneath you, neither of which allowing you much purchase of escape. As the lips closed you fell flat on your face, your cheeks cushioned by the grimy tongue of your predator. This seemed to elicit a pleasured growl that shook you to the bones.

You felt unwanted movement beneath you as the tongue shifted, sloshing you and the berries to the side of the Venusaur's drooly maw. Your heart sank as you realized what was about to happen: it was going to start chewing. Whether or not the Venusaur had teeth to chew with was beside the point. Space became limited as the slick tongue pressed you against the palate, pressure building around your squished body.

Berries began to pop and splatter your fur with their juices just before the pressure released. You were thankful that you didn't pop yourself, but your gratitude was smothered as the Venusaur continued to "chew." You were sloshed around its maw as the berries were crushed into a fruity paste, creating a thick, chunky soup to accompany you. The pokemon seemed to want you in one piece, though; while its maw was handling you roughly, you were merely slopped and squished around as it savored its meal. Venusaur was taking its time mashing up its food, tasting every ounce of its Purloin-soup. Bits of light would occasionally shine inside with its mastication, briefly giving its insides a brighter appearance.
155332221122111211.title: ... Mew?

1553322211221112111.content:
It seemed as though your time in its sloppy maw was up, though. The chewing stopped and the jaws tilted upward. The sticky stew drained down, sloshing into the gullet before you did. Nothing could stop gravity as you slid down to follow, the throat playfully squeezing around you as you entered. Even though the Venusaur didn't need to swallow, it seemed as though he wanted to feel your struggles press against the sensitive but powerful muscles. They rippled and pulsed as they squeezed you down, dragging your wet body into the frog leader's gut.

The Venusaur's belly was quite roomy despite its other contents--you noticed that you weren't the only one to fall prey to this beast. You were pressed between a Pidgeot and two Noctowls, all of whom were unconscious. You whimpered and huddled into yourself as your personal bubble was invaded by the toad's other meals. The stomach contracted and squished around you guys, stirring the fruity broth that was quickly heating up. The Venusaur didn't have to be a fire type to have a boiling heat rise within.

15533222222111211.content:
The Swampert sees the two of you standing at his doorstep and smiles, his orange eyes shining as he meets your own. "Ah, for a second, I thought it was another infected looking for an easy meal. Not that there are any to find here. Oh, but I digress, please, come in, come in." He walks back inside, and after a quick nod to Kenshi, you both walk inside, closing the door behind you. "So, this isn't exactly a safe journey to undertake, especially for one so young, what brings you here?" The Swampert asked, pouring out a couple cups of green tea and setting them on the table.

You sit on one of the chairs, taking it and drinking it down quickly, "thank you. And I've come because I heard you might be able to tell me about my family." Kenshi simply sits in the chair beside yours, taking his own sips of tea, since he was just following you.

"Oh?" He responds, but instead of asking the obvious question, he instead turns to Kenshi. "Kenshi, do you know this girl?"

Kenshi thinks about this for a second, before shaking his head, "not exactly, she was captured by one of the Victreebell, I just saved her and she asked for you Milo."

"I see...alright, but why would I know about your family?" Milo turned back to you and questioned, so you pull out and place that odd metal rod on the table. He seems like he can hardly believe what he was seeing. "That's-! It's one of the Relic Weapons!" Without warning, he reaches forward and snatches it up, observing it closer, turning it over in his paws a few times. "This crest...you're a Kaiser. What happened to your mother and father child?"

You felt a pain you hadn't felt in quite a while, and the images of your mother in her...final moments flashes in your eyes once again. "Mom...she got...eaten...I dunno what happened to dad though..."

"And your name?" He continued, while you felt a soft paw on your shoulder, glancing to see that it was Kenshi's.

You took a breath before responding, "Koyuki. Koyuki Kaiser, mister Milo."

"Milo will be fine. So...Alfwin is gone hm? I heard he'd gotten married, but I didn't know he had a child. I lost touch with him 12 years ago...which must make you about that old, right Koyuki?"

You nodded in response, "11."

"I have much to tell you child, of a time long before this accursed infection." You watch as he kneels down and reaches into an old bookcase, "now where is that dusty old thing...ah! Here it is." He pulls out what seems to be an old, and very dusty book, which he blows off and sets on the table, taking the last chair, opposite yours. "Listen well Koyuki, because while this has nothing to do with the infection, I believe that the key to beating it lies in here." When you gave him a nod and he thought you were ready to pay attention, he began.

"Long ago, Arceus, of course, created the world as we know it, everyone knows this story. What most Pokemon don't know is that not all of us were as we look today." He shows a few pictures of what seem to be more feral versions of the ancient Pokemon, and then something...odd. It looked kind of frail, and naked, furless Pokemon. But they also wore garbs, like some Pokemon will. There was also a picture of a...ball? "We were once all feral Pokemon, and ruled over by humans. Eventually, Arceus descended, and exterminated the humans, by melding our DNA together. However, this didn't quite solve everything, in fact, in some ways, things got worse, with some inherently evil Pokemon using their newfound powers for...well...evil." He turns the page, "so Arceus chose 8 bloodlines that he found pure, and entrusted each with what is known as a Relic Weapon. A bow with a never-ending quiver, a sword and shield, a battleaxe, a pair of gauntlets, a magical staff, a spear, an ancient katana, and finally, a scythe."

He pauses and looks to you meaningfully, "the Kaiser family is in charge of the scythe, which is what this is. And basically, the story ends with the 8 using their weapons to subdue evil, and this was thousands of years ago. Now, I believe that you were destined to come and meet me, and you must go and find the other users." The Swampert pulls out a map, placing it on the table, "it will be a long, arduous, and dangerous journey, and I can only point out their last known locations. Ever since this all started four years ago, I haven't been able to keep in touch with all of them, and some, like your father, I haven't talked to in even more years."

After he finished, one question kept nagging at you, "are you one of them?"

Milo laughs good-naturedly, shaking his head, "oh heavens no. I'm of the bloodline that wrote this book, so I'm more of a...historian, as it were. I can show you how I remembered your father using this though." He handed you back the...scythe you guessed, and then opened a trapdoor. "Go right down there, I'll join you in a moment."

"Okay," you said, staring down into the slightly dark basement, and climbed down the ladder, with Kenshi above you. A glance up showed you a good view of under his loincloth, which you quickly looked away from.

You climbed down that ladder into darkness for what felt like an eternity, until finally, your foot paw pressed upon the hard dirt floor, and you let out a sigh of relief, hopping off the ladder. The first thing, you noticed, is that it was pitch black in here, until a pair of lights on both sides suddenly activated, making you yelp and cover your eyes for a moment. When you opened them, you looked back to notice Kenshi had flicked on a switch with a sheepish smile. “Whoops, sorry Koyuki.”

“It’s alright,” you reply, walking out into the room and then hearing some large and heavy descending the ladder next, the Swampert joining the two of you as promised. “So…I guess the first thing I need to know is how you use this.”

Milo regarded that for a moment before shaking his head, “unfortunately, I don’t know any of the details, because as I said, I’m not one of the chosen. But I have been told that you need to…envision it, from within your heart, and from there, it will take a fitting form.”

Those words lingered for a moment as you pulled out and held the rod in your hand. “What do you mean by a fitting form?”

“The weapons differ, depending on the heart of the user, it’s hard to really explain, but your father’s scythe was black with a red blade, that he further accentuated with the blood of his enemies. I’m sure with a girl as pure as you; your scythe will be quite different.”

You tilted your head, scratching the back before shrugging, “okay…I…think that makes sense.” Holding the rod aloft, you close your eyes, thinking of a basic scythe. Then, as if coming from your heart, a ripple washed over that image, blurring and changing it in ways that felt natural, as if you had always known what this would look like. And perhaps you did.

Meanwhile, in your hands, the rod was extending, as if by magic, and when you opened your eyes, the top shot out into a curved blade. The wind around you swirled with snow, which turned into white rose petals, and almost instantly, the weapon’s color flashed to white, and a light blue blade, but a very light gradient instead of a harsh contrast like your father’s apparently was. Looking around, you wondered where the petals came from, until you realized that the scythe wasn’t heavy like you thought it would be. On the contrary, it was nearly like a feather. “Wow…”

Milo couldn’t contain his smile, “amazing, simply amazing. You’re even more of a natural than your father was young lady. Well, you have a bit of hard training ahead of you, and I’m sad to say, we don’t have a lot of time. You’ll have to go on a journey to find the other weapon holders, find the source of the infection, and cut it off at its source.”

You and Kenshi stood at Milo’s door, with him carrying a pack of some essential things you’d be needing for the long journey that lies before you. The Swampert smiles, giving you each a hug, from which you felt a warmth that you hadn’t in quite a while…almost like your father. “You two take care of each other, and I wish I had more for you, but rest assured I will when you get back.” He dared not say ‘if’, for fear of it being bad luck. “All I know is that, past the swamp, and then through Halcyon Pass, there’s a village where Tanuki the Godsbow lived…hopefully it’s still there…but at the very least, you should be able to find a clue of what happened to him. You remember what I said about him, right?”

Nodding, you respond automatically, “he’s a Zoroark, and he’d be about 40 now, with a glittering bow upon his back.” He smiled again, stepping back into his hut.

“Then I wish you the best of luck in your search.” When his door clicked shut, you both turned outwards to face the swamp, which Milo’s hut was almost on the border of between the forest and the swamp, and a few paces brought you both out of the trees.

“Ugh, this stuff is gonna get all over my feet,” you mutter begrudgingly, planting the paw into the soft peat and feeling it squish under your toes and make it wet, sending a shiver up your spine. Kenshi giggled, but stopped when you glared at him, and instead took your hand. That made you blush, which you tried hiding by focusing ahead, but not ripping your hand away.

“Don’t worry Yuki; it won’t take too long to get through here. Just remember to be careful, we never know where an infected might be hiding…” You nod to that, shivering at the thought, remembering what one did to your mother, and would have done to you. Instead, you just continue trudging through the swamp, but so far, things were uneventful.
1553322222211121111.title: Two Weeks Later

choices: The idea works and Kenshi pulls you away!
Slimes aren't the only concerns in a swamp.
15533222222111211111.content:
The trek through the swamp felt a lot longer than it probably should have, considering that your speed was low because both of your feet were starting to sink further into it, to the point that you each had to help pull them back out. Your ear twitched when your next step had a way more slimy noise that accompanied it, and the texture was a lot more dense. A scream escaped your lips when you looked down and saw a very deep violet as opposed to the normal gross brown color that covered the rest of the swamp.

It may not have been an infected, but the slime that snapped up your leg was still very ravenous, and you felt Kenshi start pulling on your arms. “Don’t worry Yuki, I gotcha!” You started pulling to him, and felt the slime giving way, glancing to it and thinking that a good Ice attack might give you an opening to escape with.
15533222222111211111.title: Slimed

choices: Nothing comes of it, and you make it to the cave without incident
You really should keep these thoughts to yourself.
155332222221112111111.content:
Your feet slid out of the ravenous slime with a squelch, and just as you hear that sound, you concentrate icy energy in your mouth to fire it at the creature. It shrieks like something otherworldly, and shrinks back, giving you enough time to grab your scythe to swing it into it. With a final blurble, it falls still, and you pull back from it with a sigh of relief. "Thanks Kenshi," you mutter, looking at him with a small smile.

He grins back to you, "it was no problem Koyuki." As you both continued on, something about what he just said bothered you.

It took until you were at the edge of the swamp, and the ground became solid rock, for you to figure it out. "You called me Yuki back there."

Kenshi freezes up at that statement, leaving you wondering why he was acting so strange. His reply made it make sense, "oh, I did? Um, sorry..."

You giggled, which only served to confuse him, as you could see from the quizzical look on his face. "It's okay Kenshi, I, I didn't really mind it at all." It made my heart flutter a little, you added to yourself, but dared not tell him that out of embarrassment, and simply continued into the canyon.

With two high, rocky walls on each side, this place sure seemed good for an ambush...
155332222221112111111.title: The idea works and Kenshi pulls you away!

choices: Kenshi was in a spot of trouble.  Back to 15 minutes earlier.
1553322222211121111111.content:
Despite preparing yourself for any eventualities, you both made it through the valley and entered the caverns as the sun began to set outside. You set your pack down after a few more minutes of walking, looking around and taking the time to marvel at the softly glowing crystals that illuminated the space. “We should rest here, Milo said this cavern is pretty long, and it seems...safe enough.”

Kenshi nods in agreement, and you both sit on the cold ground, something you find enjoyable, and even purr a little. You stop as soon as you hear Kenshi giggling. “D-Don’t laugh!”

“Sorry, sorry,” he waved his hands defensively, but still had a playful smile on his face. “I see a pool over there, so I think I’ll bathe, and then you can too.” You figure that sounds like a decent plan, and agree to watch him walk off, catching a glimpse of his smallish balls swaying under his loincloth. You blush and turn away.

What the hell are you thinking? You chastise yourself, shaking your head roughly, now isn’t the time for this! Instead, you just sigh and unpack the materials you were given to make a tent, setting up inside the dim cave, trying to force yourself not to go to the pool.

However, after half an hour passes, and you finish the preparation, you frown, wondering what Kenshi was doing to take so long, and before you can even make the conscious thought, your paws are already carrying you towards the direction he left in.
1553322222211121111111.title: Crystal Cave

choices: "N-Nevermind, head back, I'll be there after my bath."
15533222222111211111111.content:
There was a large crystal blocking the path, and from the smell and sound of running water, you could tell the pool you were looking for was on the other side. But before you could go around, you froze, another sound reaching your ears. Closing your eyes and concentrating, you could hear something that sounded like light splashing, accompanied by low grunts and...moans?

You swallowed nervously, gripping your scythe's handle and circling slowly, ready to leap in if Kenshi was in trouble. What you saw was surprising, and it took a moment to process. Kenshi snapped your dumbfounded staring, of him sitting at the edge of the pool and jacking himself off. At least, you think that's what he was doing, evidence of this being what he was moaning. "Nngh...Yuki...I can still go faster..."

Turning away, you meant to slip away before he could notice, until your nose collided with the hard crystal, eliciting a short and pained yelp. "Who's there?! Y-YUKI?!" A splash drew your eyes back to him, the young boy stuttering as he turned to you, "what're you doing here?" You could tell he was trying to act calm, though his voice was cracking. He was probably hoping you didn't see.

"U-Um...you were taking a long time so I came looking for you..." You answered, gripping your arm and averting your gaze.

The hot blush on your cheeks must have been noticeable, because Kenshi moved on to trying to explain himself. "I-It’s not what it looks like, I was just...um...sorry...I'll head back to camp."

"Wait!" That shout surprised him as much as it did you, because he froze instantly. Swallowing, you continued...
15533222222111211111111.title: A Boy's Needs

choices: Should've been more quiet, because you made a combo meal.
155332222221112111111111.content:
"I'll join you..." You could tell looking at his face that it shocked him almost as much as you shocked yourself. He nodded, slowly, dumbfoundedly, barely murmuring an 'okay' in response. Before you disrobed though, you spun your finger in the air, "that doesn't man you can watch pervert!"

The sudden outburst caught him off guard, but you could tell it made him relax, since he was giggling as he turned around. Unable to stop from smiling yourself, you pulled, well, it felt more like peeled, off the dirty shirt, and then took off your pants and filthy panties. You made a note to yourself that these needed to be washed somehow, probably when you get to the next town, and slipped into the water.

The shock of the cold was very pleasant to you, being an ice type, though your body was warming up when you said, "okay, you can turn around now." You were fully submerged to your neck, and everything below would be lost in the shining water thanks to the gentle waves. "This is really nice."

Your remark was met with a shy nod, even with your body hidden, he was having a hard time making eye contact. You giggled and poked him on the nose, the sudden motion making him squeak and fall back, flailing and splashing wildly before he was able to right himself. Retaliation wasn't expected, but he jumped at you and took you both down into the water while you were laughing. "Kya! Kenshi! Get offa me!"

He just laughed in response, "no way, this is my reve-..." Both of you froze when you gelt something...stiff...and hard poke your inner thigh. Kenshi cried out and quickly pushed away, blushing and averting his eyes. "Ah! I'm really sorry Yuki!" You could feel the blush on your own cheeks, and it only heated up as you drifted over to him.

The boy froze when you took his hand, "I-it's okay Kenshi..." You swallowed, despite the fact that your throat was getting really dry, and leaned forward until your lips were planted on his. His eyes widened, but you both closed them simultaneously, heightening your awareness of his tongue, stroking along yours gently, and moving to explore your mouth while your saliva mixed.

A soft squeak escaped your lips when you felt him squeeze your ass, though he immediately withdrew and pulled back. "Ah, s-sorry, I'm moving too fast aren't I?"

Even though I'm chosen, that doesn't mean something couldn't happen to us, so I wanted to tell you while I still could." It was as if someone opened a floodgate, once you started speaking, you just went along with whatever came to your mind.

He gripped your sides and pushed you against the back of the pool, before pushing you up. "W-We shouldn't do this in the water." You only nodded numbly, watching him climb out of the water, and you could tell he was trying not to stare at you. But you couldn't blame him, considering your eyes became nearly glued to his wet, and stiff, cock. You could feel his eyes scanning over you, as if he was actually feeling along your dripping wet naked body with his hands. Looking down, you saw that the fur on your small breasts was clinging to them, and your bluish nipples were poking straight out. Getting the hint, you wrapped your legs around his waist, feeling the tip of his cock brush against your pussy while he leaned forward and started giving you another passionate kiss.
