That's when it hit you: The victims were raped by them before turning That realization made you sick to your stomach, but you simply replied: "I see."

         "Even though they can infect other pokemon and turn them into more of them, physically there's nothing wrong with them. That's where you come in. You must find the source of this infection, stop it, and find a cure for this infection. And keep your sister safe while your at it." You start to panic at the thought. "I don't know. I just found out about this." He put his hand on your shoulder. "You can Rai. Your a Voltaire (their family name) you can do anything." Your father then proceeds to take off his medallion and give it to you. His medallion. He told me his father's passed it down to their sons for generations Tears started to form in your eyes. "You can do this. We believe in you." Your parents say in unison. With renowned confidence, you wipe away the tears, put on the medallion and say "You can count on me." They put up a small smile and say "We know."
15533222222221111111.title: How it spreads.

choices: But was attacked before being able to finish.
155332222222211111111.content:
You took a moment to rest up before deciding it's time to start on your quest. You tell your sister it's time to go. She comes out of her room holding a picture in her hands. "What's that?" she gives it to you and you see that it's a photo of them and their parents on a picnic. You smile at that pleasant moment before giving it back to her. "Don't worry. We may be gone for a while, but we'll be back. Like our father said, the infected are physically all right. We'll bring them back, I promise." Your sister looks up at you and ask: "You really believe there's a way." You hugged her before saying "I know there is." She smiled and then say: "All right brother, let's go."

         The two of you proceeded to escape the city while avoiding trouble in the streets. You told your sister to not panic and stay close. You see other pokemon fighting the infected. Some were overpowering them, others are not so lucky. You try to keep your sister from watching the ones who are about to rape their victims. You were near the rear entrance when you heard a scream from the lower right. "That sound like.." You didn't finished before you start pursuing the sound. Turning around the corner, you see a Buneary being attacked by a Swampert.

         When you noticed yellow ribbons in the Buneary's ears, you automatically know who she was. "Kate, I need you to hide. Don't leave until I say so, you understand?" She nods and proceeds to go into the bush. You go after the Swampert and use quick attack on it. While it didn't do much damage, it provided the distraction for the Buneary to get some distance from it. You then attacked with thundershock, but you then realized that the Swampert was a duel water-ground type and it wouldn't effect it. The Swampert took that opening and used mud shot, hitting you in the face and blinding you. You kneeled down in pain and tried to rub it off. The Swampert then started to charge at you...

Author's note: My new chapter after the prologue. Readers if you have questions, comments, suggestions, etc. regarding my story, let me know via email or notebook. Thank you.
155332222222211111111.title: A Friend in Need

1553322222222111111111.content:
All of the sudden, the swampert falls to the ground hard. On top of him was the buneary that he helped moments ago. The swampert tried to knock her off, but she jumped off before it connected. She then attacks with hi-jump kick while you use iron tail. Both attacks landed at the same time knocking out the frog. You take a moment to breathe from the tough battle. "Rai." She starts to say, but you stop her by saying: "Let's thank each other later. Right now we need to get out of here." She nods and walks towards you. You call your sister to you and the three of you proceeds to the rear entrance, avoiding trouble along the way.

         It was late at night when your group got some distance from Aurora, you found a area surrounded by thick brambles, which would provide good hiding spot and protection against the infecteds. "Okay, I think we should be safe to take a rest for now." Just after you said that your friend rushed into you with a hug, nearly knocking you down. "Rai! You're alright. I thought I wouldn't see you in a situation like this." "It's all right Rachael. I'm surprise to see you too." You say before hugging her back. She breaks it before asking: "What's going on here?"

Character bio in Rai's POV: Rachael is my long time best friend. We met in poke-elementary long time ago and hung out since then. I know everything about, especially about her fear of snake or snake-like pokemon.

         You explained everything to her about the infection as best you can. The incident in the past, what happened today, how it spreads (you whispered certain bits to her), all the way about why your sister is here. "Whoa." was all she let out. "I know right?" She looks at you concerned and say: "I don't like this. Maybe we should find a place to hide and wait this out. I'm su-" You cut her off by saying: "Where will we go? How long will it be before the mess is fixed? Your right, it's going to be dangerous, but I'm the only one who knows about this and can stop it from getting worse!" Rachael stands there, shocked from the whole speech. After a little while, she nods and says: "well, we'll need to be careful along the way." Now it was your turn to be shocked, then you ask: "You mean?" She nods and says "I'm coming with you." You studded a bit before saying: "Are you sure about this? I appreciate it, but-" She then cut you off by saying: "I'm sure, and besides, it's going to be tough for you alone, and I'm your friend." You blush a bit from her words. Noticing it's dark out you say to them to try to get some rest and you take first watch. As they settled down, you thought while you're concerned about her, you're happy to have someone there for you.

((Rachael has joined you!))
1553322222222111111111.title: Rachael the buneary

15533222222221111111111.content:
Morning comes with no incidents in the night. You woke up from the sunlight peering in the trees. You see Kate talking with Rachael. You smile and say with a teasing tone, "Good morning girls." They both hear you and both say good morning to you, except with with Rachael adding, "And what's with the girl part?" You both giggled. "Let's get something to eat before we go." You say to them and they nod. You fix a fire and prepare to make a berried soup for you three.

         After you finished, you poured an equal amount for each of your companions. As the three of you eat, Rachael commented on your soup, "Wow Rai, how do you know how to cook?" "My dad took my sister and I camping sometimes and on one of them he taught me how to use berries we found to make soup." You answer back. "Well, my compliments to the chef. This is amazing." "My brother's the best!" You sister spoke out. You put up a silly grin and say, "Aw shucks Kate, that's not true." The three of you smiled and finished your breakfast.

          The three of you then started cleaning up the mess. While cleaning you noticed something shining close to you. You walked to them and started digging them up, revealing to be two orbs, one bigger than the other, both with a wavy look inside. You picked them up and went back with your group. After traveling for a while and fighting off infecteds, you ended up at...
15533222222221111111111.title: Morning Pleasantries

155332222222211111111111.content:
Your group comes to a stop at a entrance into a dark cave. You can only see a foot into it before going to complete blackness. "Is this the right way?" Rachael ask you worryingly. You take out your map and see where you are. "We're at the entrance to Twilight Cave, looks pretty deep. We should be able to reach the exit before sundown. Afterwards, it should be just a two-days travel to Silverhills (The town dad mentioned experienced the outbreak before we did.)." Rachael looks concerned. "I don't know Rai, isn't there another way?" You shake your head before answering, "Unless you want the longer route." She lowers her head while your sister shivers. Hoping to calm them down, you say: "Listen, I know you two are scared, I'm scared too. Everyone gets scared in their life once in a while, but we can't let it stop us. If we do, they already won." Hearing this, they look a little better. â€œAll right lets go."

         With that, everyone picked up their bags and start to head in. Remembering those orbs you picked up at your last campsite, you say, â€œOh wait you two, I found something I need to show you." They stopped and wait until you take out the orbs you found. â€œI found these at camp. Do you know anything about these things?" You ask Rachael, but she just shakes her head. You sigh as your sister tugs your shoulder as she ask, â€œCan I have one of them? They're pretty." The pachirisu put on her best puppy dog eyes at you. Unable to resist, you say she could, but only if she's careful not to lose it. She nods and you give her the small one. The two of you put the orbs in your respective bags in continued on into the cave.

         As you and your group enter the cave, you pause to generate enough electrical power to provide light for you three to see. Thanks to your dads training, you can keep this up for a whole day and still have enough power to fight. The three of you continued deep into the cave for quite some time. As you enter a room with a circular area and the dark abyss at the bottom, you hear a screech as a swarm of zubats appears out of nowhere. You put your sister back and you and Rachael tensed up, ready to fight. But they just flew past you and out the way you came. The three of took a sigh of relief when...
155332222222211111111111.title: Venturing through

choices: you hit him with a thunder punch!
1553322222222111111111111.content:
"I wouldn't get so comfortable if I were you." A male voice speaks out startling the three of you. Out of the darkness comes a Scrafty about the same height as you, if you don't count his Mohawk. With him are four Scraggy. His eyes sport a hazel color, but that thought doesn't comfort you. â€œWell, well, well. A Raichu, a Buneary,and a Pachirisu. We were about to go out and look for food, but now we won't need to." He says menacingly and the others nod in response. You move to be in front of your sister as you say, â€œHey wait a minute! We're not one of them." He just chuckles before saying, â€œWe can clearly tell, but no matter, I've preferred fresh ones anyhow."

         That statement causes your anger to rise. After this started, he hides out in this cave and attacks and eats anyone who passes by, regardless if they're infected or not?! â€œI don't know if you noticed, but there are others like us who are being are being attacked by those monsters! You can't go off eating the ones who're still sane!" You exclaimed while releasing sparks from your cheeks. The Scrafty shakes his head before saying, â€œWake up kid! It's only a matter of time before something comes around and gets y'all. It's a shame that girl will fall to this, or worse."

         That was your breaking point. You let out a terrifying cry and unleash a thunderbolt towards him, he dodged out of the way, took out one of his teammates. â€œI've always like it when then they fight. Get em boys!" The Scraggy then charged at them. â€œKate stay back! Rachael let's go!" The two of you then ran towards them. You started things off with a quick attack at the one closest to you. One Scraggy attacks Rachael with low kick , but she jumped up into the air and landed a hi-jump kick on his head, knocking him out flat. You used thundershock to knock one down in a electric heap, the other took the opportunity and headbutts you. You staggered a bit, but it wasn't enough to stop you from swinging around and using Iron Tail. The Scraggy had no time to react as he was sent spinning to the ground, unconscious.

         You took a moment to breathe before losing it all of the sudden from the Scrafty using Take-Down. Rachael sees this and and goes in for the tackle, but he sidesteps it and counters with a Faint Attack, knocking her down as well. â€œHey! Leave her alone." You cry out as you spring up and come after him, arms out. Each of you grab each others shoulders as you both try to overpower the other. Then...
1553322222222111111111111.title: Scrafty troubles

15533222222221111111111111.content:
You struggled to try to overpower the scrafty. Dammit! I can't lose here. you thought as you start to gather electricity within your body, but instead of unleashing it, you focus it to your left hand, let it back, and swung at him. He doesn't have a chance to react as he was hit in the jaw hard. He staggers back from the impact, which gives you an opening to swing around and smack him with a iron tail attack. the scrafty landed on his back. You're glad your dad taught you that move, you could've wasted a lot of your power on one pokemon.

         Through heavy breaths, you yell, "You done? You want more?" The scrafty struggles to get up while coughing up blood and says, "You're better than I thought, but just wait. You'll learn that in a world like this, it's every pokemon for itself, trust will just make you soft." You tense up a bit from his words, but you look at him and say, " I know I can't trust everyone, but I'll find those I know I can trust. I'll find the one who cause this disaster and make him pay for this!" â€œFoolish boy!" He cried and shot a sludge bomb at you. You dodged, but it caught you off guard and you fell on your back. You look up and see the scrafty charging at you. Panicking, you put your feet up as he lunged at you and you threw him over you. You didn't notice the edge a foot behind you, and he fell down into the darkness. All you can hear are his screams and the echoing thud at the end.

         You sat yourself up, looked at the direction you threw him and stared at the abyss. All the scraggy recovered and saw what you did. They then bolted past the three of you and ran out of where you've entered You know he would've killed you and the others, but you never meant for him to die. You hear Kate and Rachael rushing towards you. â€œRai! You ok?" The buneary ask you. You just turn to stare at her, then back at the edge. â€œBig bro?" Your sister ask, concerned to see her brother looking like that. â€œI'm alright, it's just that I've never meant for it to happen." Rachael put her paw on your shoulder. â€œRai, it's not your fault. He would've killed you, all of us even." â€œI know, but it doesn't make it easier to bear." Rachael then sat next you, you sister does the same. The three of you sat there for a little while before you get up and tell them it's time to go. They nod and grabbed their bags while eating a Oran berry to recover their strength, thankfully no one suffered any serious injury. Once everyone's ready, you three continued on to the exit.
15533222222221111111111111.title: First blood

choices: But fought her fear and uses bounce!
And the seviper takes advantage of her fear!
155332222222211111111111111.content:
As the three of you exited the cave, you had to shield your eyes from the brightness. You look at the others and ask, â€œIs everyone ok?" They nod, then Rachael asked about you. You stared at her, then say, â€œI will be." She doesn't buy it and says, â€œRai, what happened was terrible, but there's something else to look at." Confused, you asked her, â€œWhat else is there to look at?" â€œYou feel guilty about it. That shows you have a good strong heart. You fought to protect us and you don't agree with what he said about everyone for themselves." You take a moment to think about what she said. You feel guilty about what happened, but your intentions was in the right place. Seeing that, you look at her and say thanks. The rabbit smiles seeing her friend feeling better.

         Seeing the sun's still up high, you say that we can keep going. After walking for a while, the sun eventually started to set. You take a look around and see trees and bushes filled with apples, seeds, and berries. You look and your pack to see you're running low on food items. â€œWe'll camp here for the night. I'll set up the bags and prepare the fire for the soup, but we're running low on food items. Rachael, can you and Kate go and gather some apples, berries and seeds while I set up?" The both nod and started heading out. â€œBe careful!" You cry out before they disappear through the bushes.

         You prepared the sleeping bags and began preparing the fire when you hear a noise ahead of you. â€œHello? Who's there?" Out of the bushes comes a seviper slithering into your camp. It was female, as she was sporting two plump breast. She had two long red fangs hanging from her mouth, sporting violet eyes, her whole body covered with black scales with golden hexagons and purple scar-like patterns save her stomach, arms and hands, chest and breast which shows her black skin. At her side you see her tail with a blade the same color as her fangs. You recover from the sight and ready yourself for a fight. The seviper naga started moving around in a strange motion. You don't know what she's planning, but you started gathering electricity in your body for a attack. The seviper then brings her tail covering her face, as if one's holding a fan. She lowers it a bit to wink at you.

         Afterwords, you start to feel strange. There's something about this snake that's so...alluring. Wow. She's so..beautiful. you thought while blushing from the sight. No longer seeing you as a threat, the seviper slithers towards you and puts her hand under your chin, tongue flicking at you. You just stood there, staring in her eyes as her tail moves to her legs and starts coiling around you. Fully in her coils save your head, she starts licking your face while squeezing you teasingly, getting a moan from you. Satisfied with your flavor, she starts opening her mouth wide, unhinging her jaws. You stare on, not worrying about the consequences.

         Before the seviper starts dining, a voice spoke out, breaking the spell the snake had on you. You shake you head as you hear a certain buneary speaking, â€œRai. We're back with the stuff. How's it going on yo-whaaa!" Rachael couldn't finished when she spotted you in a coils of a big snake. Kate hides behind her, horrified at what she's seeing. The seviper turns and hisses angrily at them and starts tightening her coils around you. You struggle and tried to use a electric attack, but can't concentrate from the pain. â€œR..Rachael. Help me!" The buneary stands there shaking, â€œI...I can't!" You cried out in pain while your sister exclaims, â€œIf you don't, my brother will die!" Rachael turns to see her in tears. Rachael closes her eyes...
155332222222211111111111111.title: Hypontizing beauty

1553322222222111111111111111.content:
The seviper then plunges towards her fast, but Rachael suddenly springs up into the air, dodging her attack. She lands on the snakes head hard. From your friend's attack, the snakes grip on you loosens, allowing you to slip out and away from the seviper, but not before smacking her in a face with iron tail. Fighting two enemies, the seviper is at a disadvantage. She gather poison within her tail, and lunge it at the buneary. You ran and pushed her out of the way, getting hit in your sides instead. She gasped as she saw you hit the ground. While got back up,bleeding at the area you were hit at. You then start to feel sick and dizzy, you realized that the seviper has poisoned you! â€œGuh..Rachael, we need to end this fast." She nods and suggest, â€œLet's attack her at once." You nod and at once, you two charge at her at the same time. The seviper had no time to react as it was hit by your thunder punch andRachaels hi-jump kick. The seviper was sent flying far. While she still got back up, the seviper turn tail and slithers away fast.

         Rachael breathes out in relief. â€œRai?" Kate speaks out. Rachael turns to see you on your knee with your sister next to you. â€œWhat's wrong?" You sister ask worryingly. It's the poison from her poison tail attack." You winced after finishing, startling the pachirisu. â€œYou two wouldn't happen to find any Pecha berries did you?" She looks at you confused. â€œIt's a small, round, pink berry. Soft to the touch." Rachael describes it for you. â€œIn that case, yeah we picked some. I'll get one." When then goes get her pack she dropped. â€œYou may need a Oran berry while you at it." Rachael cries out. She sits next to you, supporting you. â€œYou saved me. Thanks." The rabbit smiles as she says, If you and your sister didn't helped me out, it might've ended badly. So I've have you two for thanks." You smiled back at the comment, happy to have her as a friend and companion.

         After getting healed up and patched on on your injury, you went back to making dinner. You proceed to pour the soup in each bowls. After everyone finishes, everyone helped cleaned up after the mess. Noticing you wincing in pain, Rachael volunteers to take the first watch. Thanking her, you go hug Kate goodnight, and go into your sleeping bag to get some rest.
1553322222222111111111111111.title: Fighting her fear

15533222222221111111111111111.content:
You wake up from a mysterious coldness hitting you. You look around to see that you are alone. You see their sleeping bags near you, but they're empty. â€œHello? Rachael? Kate? Where are you?" You get no response. You feel uneasy from the situation. Worried about them, you get up and started walking down a visible path, thinking that they haven't gone too far.

         As you keep on walking, you can't shake the feeling that you rbeing watched. You start to speed up your walking from the panic your feeling. When you reach a clearing, you try calling out to them, â€œRachael?! Kate?! Hellooo? If you're there, say something." Despite you crying out to them, you still don't get a response. You start to worry when you saw a shadow flew above you. You quickly looked up, but see nothing. â€œWho's there? Show yourself?" You cry out to the hiding pokemon. â€œVery well." A deep, cold voice speaks out. You turn to see where the voice was, but unable to pinpoint it.

         Out of nowhere appears a hydreigon. It crashes into the earth knocking you off your feet. â€˜Great Arceus, he's huge.â€™ you thought as you see it. The pokemon stands at a tall 8 ft high. The dragon looks at you and chuckles for a bit before speaking,â€œSo you're the one my master was talking about. It's funny, I expected someone a little more formidable, but instead, I get a little mouse all alone." You flinched from its words, but you shake it off as you ask, â€œYour master, you mean the one that created this monstrous virus?" â€œIndeed I am, but there's no need to think about it, since you won't be leaving here alive." The three-headed dragon then launched its breath at you. You were able to dodge it at the last moment before turning tail to run, knowing you're no match for it.

         You were unable to get far when you reached the edge of the ground. You managed to stop yourself from running off the edge. You look down to see nothing at the bottom. You're trapped on a floating land with a menacing hydreigon! Realizing there's no other options, you turn towards the dragon and get in your fighting stance. Your thought in your head was:

         It looks powerful, but I have to fight! There's no other options!
15533222222221111111111111111.title: Rai's nightmare

155332222222211111111111111111.content:
You stand face to face in front of not just a powerful looking enemy, but a servant to the one who created this infection. The Hydreigon roars out loudly. It looks strong, but you can't back down. The dragon lunged at you with its maws, but you dodge it effortlessly with your agility. You unleash a Thunderbolt attack, but it doesn't appear to be seriously hurt. You were about to use it again, but the dragon then lets out a terrible screech, forcing you to cover your ears from the pain. 'That screech attack! I can feel the ringing in my ears. Great Arceus, this isn't some ordinary nightmare, this is a move! I've been given a real nightmare!'

         The dragon spins around and swung at you with its tail. You weren't aware of the situation and was hit hard with the impact knocking you to the ground. You groan from the pain as you got back up. You start of with Agility, then follow it up with an Iron Tail at him, but the Hydreigon dodges it and grabs you before you hit the ground. â€œL..Let me go!" You struggle immensely, but you can't break free from the dragon's grasp.

â€œIt's surprising how you made it this far. You couldn't even make this interesting." The hydreigon sounds disappointed. â€œI thought about having you for myself, but I find it more enjoyable to see you preyed upon by others." As he finished, he drops you which lands your body on your back as the dragon roars out loud, nearly deafening you. When you opened your eyes, he was gone, but you find yourself surrounded by a horde of infected. You try to get up, but the pain is too much. You close your eyes and scream as they prepare to pounce.

         â€œRai?! Rai, Wake up! Wake up!" Your eyes snap open and you gasp as if you couldn't breathe at the moment. You turn to see Kate and Rachael looking at you. Both unharmed, yet with a worried expression on their faces. â€œRai, are you okay? You've been tossing and turning and groaning in your sleep for ten minutes." Your sister explained to you. â€œAnd you're covered in sores and bruises that appeared as well." Rachael pointed out. You look over your body and see that they're right. â€œWhat happened?"

         You explained the best you can about your experience. They were shocked when they found out you were attacked in your sleep. â€œGreat Arceus" was all they had to say. â€œWe were being watched?" Your sister asked fearfully.

â€œIt seems so, but it seems that you disappointed him, so he might not attack you again. For now at least." Rachael pointed out. That thought made you feel a little better, but she has a point.

â€œEven though he's aware of us, we must pull forward. We'll become stronger, we need help as well, and once we meet again, it won't end the same." You say, resolve in your eyes. They both smiled seeing you not letting this bother you. â€œIt's your watch. Are you up for it?"

"I'm ok. Thanks for asking." Rachael nods and proceeds to her sleeping bag. You turn and look around to your surroundings. You feel someone besides you. You turn to see your sister next to you.

â€œCan't sleep?" You ask concerned. The pachirisu shakes her head no.

â€œI'm scared big brother." Kate admits.

â€œMe too, but don't worry. We'll find the source and stop it." The two of you then look up at the moon in the sky.

â€œYou really think we can get through this Rai?"

"Together, we'll make it."

Kate then nudges closer to you. â€œI'm cold."

You place your arm over your sister. â€œTogether Kate." The two siblings smiled and watch the moon.

Meanwhile, at a unknown Terrain


         A hydreigon appeared from the entrance of a deep underground labyrinth under a volcano. â€œMaster, the boy was unable to put up resistance against me, I can finish him off with your permission." The pokemon chuckles. â€œThere's no need, the way I see it, he won't get far." The dragon nods and exited the cave.
155332222222211111111111111111.title: One sided battle

choices: Something bad happens along the way
1553322222222111111111111111111.content:
Except for that nightmare incident, your remaining rest time was okay and everything else was uneventful that night as the sun rises on your watch. You proceeded to wake your sleeping companions. "Good morning, how you two rested?" they both nodded their heads. "OK. I will prepare breakfast, but it's going to be light. Don't want to overindulge." They understand and started putting up their sleeping bags and waited. You did so as well as it cooked. A little while later, it was ready and you told them to sit down as you prepare their bowls. You three sat there eating as well as making sure no one disturbs you. After the infected seviper incident last afternoon, you don't want to end up in the same situation twice in a short time.

         "Hey Rai, how much further to Silverhills?" Rachael asks while eating. You thought about it as you bring out your map. Once opening it, you pinpoint the location of Twilight Cave and found a small forest near it. "We must be here, and Silverhills is quite a distance that way. We made good progress exiting the cave quickly. If we keep moving and if we're lucky, we should arrive before sundown." you point out to them. "Hopefully we'll find out how this happens." Rachael says, "Yeah, me too." After finishing up, you three clean up around the camp and put on your packs. "Is everyone ready?" Rachael nods, but Kate puts up her hand as she says, "I got to go to the bathroom." You sigh and tell her to be quick and don't go too far. she nods and dash out of sight a second later. "Wow she's fast. I'm surprise you can keep up her." Rachael comments about your sister. You sigh and say, "She takes after her mother.â When you mentioned your mother, you start to think about them and the others.They had to turn long by now. I hope they're still alive at least. What kind of sick monster would do this? you thought quietly. Rachael took sight of this and pat your back to comfort you. you smile and say thanks, but then you thought about her folks. "What happen to your family? If you don't mind telling me." She saddens and says, "The same as yours, except they already like them before I arrived home. I was attacked by them before I escaped. I was making my way to an exit before that swampert attacked me. I was tired already, and if it wasn't for you. I might've been that frogs lunch." "I'm sorry, we'll bring them back. I promise." She smiles at your words.

         After Kate returns, The three of you continue on, you hope nothing bad happens as you make your way towards Silverhills.
1553322222222111111111111111111.title: Morale building

15533222222221111111111111111111.content:
The sun has set by the time your little group has reached the entrance of Silverhills. "Well, we made it." Rachael looks at you with a smile, but you can tell that shes nervous. She has a good reason too. While the gate's standing, it's damaged. You place your paw on her shoulder to calm her down. "We'll need to be careful." Her smile becomes more genuine. You hear a gasp from your sister behind you. "Kate! What happened?!" You and Rachael turn around to see her not under attack, but busy picking out flowers and putting them in her bag. "I never seen flowers like these, they're beautiful." She says sweetly. You and Rachael breathed out in relief, but you fold your arms and say, â€œKate." The squirrel stopped and turned to look at you two. "What's wrong?" She asked confused. "Nothing, except that we thought that you were under attack from your gasp." Rachael answers for you. The pachirisu realized what you're talking about and bows her head down. You approach her and pat her head. "Hey, we're not mad, just try to be more aware of what you do." She looks up at you and nods. "Okay. Let's go!"

         You approach the door and put both your paws on the wood. "Be ready to run just in case." You tell them both. Kate moves behind Rachael while the buneary braced herself. Taking a deep breath, you start to push the door as hard as you can. You open a crack to see inside to make sure There's no infected nearby. Seeing it's clear, you push the door wide enough to allow the others inside.

         Inside, he town was in worser shape. Things scattered everywhere, buildings are damaged, some destroyed, and a feeling of dread fills the air. Kate cups her mouth from the site. "Rai. What happened here?" You stand there, looking at the chaos this infection has caused to this town. "I wish I knew." You simply say to her. Rachael turns to you. "So where do we start?" You think about it until you bear a scream coming from somewhere. "We'll start with that! Let's go!" With that, you three ran toward the direction of the noise.

         You heard the scream again not too far. You slowed down to a stop at a corner. You three peek around the corner to see three pokemon fending off 4 pokemon. From what you can tell, the surrounded ones are normal and others are infected. Those pokemon are in trouble." Rachael whisperers to you. "I know. We need a pl-", you were unable to finish you sentence because of what you're seeing. One of the infecteds, a ursaring, picks up the defeated cranido, but instead of shoving him in his mouth, it starts inserting him into it's penis. The head encircles the non-infecteds feet and reaches its legs before you turn away from it, shocked at what you witness. Thankfully, Rachael was able to turn Kate's head away from them before she saw anything.

         Rachael kept your sister in her arms as she ask you with the look of disgust, â€œWhat on earth was it doing." You are too stunned yourself to answer. You are aware of vore in the world before the infection, but you never expected it to go further than oral. "What's happening?" Your sister ask you with fear in her eyes. You just said, "Their being eaten." She cringes hearing you. You brace yourself before peeking again to see the bear swallowing the dinos head in his cock. A ponyta's stomach is sagging and shaking. The only one left is a zoroark fending them off.

         Realizing there's still a chance, you say, "Rachael, we can save that zoroark. I'll paralyze the bear while you finish it with hi-jump kick." The ursaring is the biggest threat that must be rid of. She looks at you with concern and ask, â€œAre you sure, we don't know him. What if he's like that scrafty?" You cringe after hearing that name, but you quickly shake it off and answer, â€œI know, but it's wrong to leave him to this fate!" She nods in understanding and wait for your command. â€œKate, you stay here! Don't look or come out until I say so or something happens!" She nods.

         After giving your orders, you watch the situation. You see the bear about the finish the zoroark off...
15533222222221111111111111111111.title: Silverhills

choices: try to attack him before he does
155332222222211111111111111111111.content:
The infected ursaring was readying its slash attack to finish off the fox. Before it struck the final blow, the bear finds that he's unable to move his arm, let alone his body. Next he felt small electric current moving around his body, coming from his back. He forced his head to turn just to see a bunearys left hindpaw come crashing into his face.

         The bear was seeing stars for a moment before recovering before he recovered in time to see a raichu dashing towards him and jumping up and spinning with his tail glowing. It didn't have enough time to react before his iron tail came crashing in the same area the rabbit had hit him. It backed away a brief moment before collapsing on the ground unconscious.

         You and Rachael looked at each other and nodded before moving towards the zoroark. You threw a Oran berry at him, telling him to use it. Knowing what berry it is, he eats it without hesitation. He feels his strength returning to him. He gets up off his knee and gets in a fighting stance between the two of you. The fox takes a look at you. â€œYou two.." he starts speaking, â€œWe'll talk about this later. Right now we need to fight!" You respond quickly, tiny sparks coming from your cheeks. The black fox was shocked that these teens are risking their lives to help him, but he put that thought on hold.

         The three of you stand off against the three infecteds in front of you. The ponyta takes the first move by charging at the buneary with fire spin. But the buneary jumps out of the way in time. The firehorse mane erupts in rage before inhailing for a flamethrower. Before it was able to release it, the zoroark charged at it, claws infused with a spectral aura, and slashed it as he passed by. It neighs in pain before Rachael came crashing down on it with bounce. â€œThat's for my comrades you bastard!" He yells at it.

         You launch a quick attack at a sunflora, connecting it with it. The flower recovers and launches two vines at you. You ran to dodge, but the came too fast and they slam into your gut, knocking you off your feet. You rolled backwards back onto your feet and unleash a thundershock at it. The plant cries out in pain and slumps down.

         You charge at it to finish it when all of a sudden, you see a side of you getting brighter. You turn to see a grumpig generating light. Seeing this, you turn towards him to stop it, but the obese pig grins and makes it disappear. You briefly wondered where'd it go before it appeared inches in front of your face and exploded, blinding you and forcing you into a stop. You rub your eyes from the pain, but you hear the pig in front on you generating power again. You tried to open your eyes, but that flash makes it hard to keep them open. The grumpig has gained enough power and prepares to fire. You...
155332222222211111111111111111111.title: Pre-emptive strike

1553322222222111111111111111111111.content:
Knowing it's foolish to attack blindly, you stand where you are and listen to where the blast comes from. Hearing a vibrant noise from your right, you jump forward out of the way of it. Feeling less pain at your eyes, you tried opening them again. While the pain still lingers, you are able to pinpoint the grumpig trying to regenerate power again. "Oh no you don't!' You cried out as you unleash your Thunderbolt attack at him.

         The grumpig was unprepared as a strong electric current coursed through his body, forcing him on his knees. It tries to stand, but the paralysis from your last attack has its effect on him. Taking advantage of his inaction, you charged towards him and lashed out your Iron Tail attack, connecting to the side of his head. The pig spun around for a bit before collapsing on the ground, unconscious.

         You take a quick breath before checking on the sunflora, who just launched some leaves at your way. You moved out of it's way with agility then unleashed a thunderbolt towards it. Being already weak from your previous attacks, the plant type couldn't take it and fell to the ground as well. You make a small arm pump as you say confidently, "There's nothing a Voltaire can't do!"

         You check on the others to see that they both gone through their fights well. You proceed towards them. "Are you two ok?" The two nod towards you. "You two risked your lives to save me." The zoroark says with confusion in his voice. You were about to speak when a familiar scream interrupts you three.

         You turn towards the direction to see your sister being attacked by a poochyena. "Kate!" You cry out before dashing with agility, Rachael fallows as well. The wolf pup tackles the squirrel off her hindpaws and would've continued his assault if you haven't knocked him away with quick attack. The pup recovered from your light attack, but when it turned towards you, it also sees a buneary by your side in her fighting stance. Seeing that it's a lost cause, the infected turn tail and ran off.

         Seeing the situation has passed, you turn to check on your sister. "Are you okay?" You ask concerned. The patchirisu got up and dust herself off, then ran into your arms. "I was scared." she says. You wrap your arms around to comfort her. "I know, but don't worry. I won't let anything happen to you!" Kate looks up to you. "I promise." "Me too!" Your friend promises too. She smiles from it.
1553322222222111111111111111111111.title: Not Falling Here!

15533222222221111111111111111111111.content:
The sun has fully set by the time the incident has passed. The four of you went to a distant building still standing and took shelter there. You take a look around to ensure there's no one inside. After searching, you found some candles and a match. Using a match, you light them to provide light in the darkness, but be careful to try not to make your presence known. Afterwards, the four of you sat down around the lights.

         Taking a sigh of relief, you say "Now we should be able to talk now without any problems." The zoroark nods and looks at you and Rachael, "Why you do that?" You both look at him in confusion. "I mean why you tried to save my life?" You blink a couple times before answering, "It was the right thing to do. You would've died with them if we didn't." The zoroarks red eyes widen at your words. "What?" you ask. He shook his head before continuing. "I was just shocked to hear you did that with good intentions. I seen those who would do the opposite of what you did." He then thought about what you said. "When did you found us?" You fold your ears back guiltily before answering, Just mere monents before they..." you couldn't finish because of the revolting sight that was burned into your eyes.

         The zoroark bows his head down in sorrow of what happened. "Well, thanks for the help.. heh, we haven't been able to introduce ourselves." He chuckles for a bit. "My name is Neku Casna" "I'm Rachael Lynehart." Your friend says after him. Neku looks at you next. "Rai Voltaire." Neku started chuckling a bit. "Sorry, it's funny considering..." "Yeah, my mom like the way 'rai' sounds in raichu, so they gave me that. and this.." You move your arm around your sisters shoulder, "is my little sister Katherine, though lot of people call her Kate for short." Seeing their physique, Neku ask, "How old are you three, if you don't mind me asking?" You and Rachael look at each other before you reply, "Me and rachael are both 17. Kate.. she's 6 but be turning 7 in little over a week." Naku pause after hearing that. "Pokemon your age going through this. Must've been tough."
15533222222221111111111111111111111.title: Meeting Neku

155332222222211111111111111111111111.content:
"What were you doing here?" You ask Neku. "Me and the others were looking for supplies to take to the survivor camp." You ears perked up when hearing that last word. "There's a survivor camp?" "A little distance from here, but not too far. You two save my life, so the least i could do is escort you there." You thought about his offer then say, "Thank you, we might stay for a day or so before going." The zoroark looks confused. "What do you mean going?" It was then you realized you never told him anything about your journey. "Well uh...this will come as a total shock but..." You pause a bit to prepare before continuing, "The three of us are trying to find the source of this infection and stop it, as well as a way to restore the infected to normal."

         The black fox stared at them with disbelief, these kids are on a journey to restore this place back to way it was?!?! He stayed silent until he started laughing lightly. Rachael turned her head towards you and you just shrugged your shoulders, you expected this reaction. He calmed down enough and said, "Sorry, I've heard some funny shit, but that..." he paused when he saw that your expression hasn't changed. "You're serious?" "Yes, and could you please mind your language? There's a child present." "Kid, you're a lot tougher than you appeared, but do you really think you three could stop this by yourselves?" You take a deep breath before replying, "I may be young, but I'm not stupid. But something like this won't just go away. This will continue until were all eaten or one of them." Neku was shocked at the raichu's speech, but recovered and said, "It just seemed a lot for a youth to handle." I'll be lying if I say I wasn't scared about what I'll be facing," You pause and held the madallion your father intrusted to you before finishing, "but I made a promise to my parents that I'll see us through."

         Seeing that it gotten darker, Neku says, "We can talk more later, we should all get some sleep." You add something after he finishes, "When this mess started, me and Rachael take turns watching the surroundings-" "so we don't get ambushed in our sleep. Not a bad idea. Well to rapay you a little, I'll take first watch." You nod, "I'll go next, then you rachael we go by a hour each turn." The three of you nod and you and rachael left to a room while neku stays behind.

         Before you lay down to rest, you go to check up on your sister. Being her first actual encounter with an infected up close like that, you wonder how she's holding up. She looks up at you and smiles, "Hey Rai." she says happily. "Hey there Kate." you respond in return. You kneel down to her level and ask, "That incident before, how're you holding up?" "I'm okay." She says but saddens before replying, I just wish mom and dad are here, I hope there okay. I mean.." You pat your sister on her head. "I know, me too." You say.

         She looks at you and all of the sudden she starts to giggle. You look at her in confusion. "Sorry, sometimes when I stare at your head, I imagine something popping up behind you." "That's not funny!" you tell her at first, but when you picture it, you couldn't help but giggle as well. She stares at you expectantly. "Okay, it's a little funny." you admit looking away at her. She starts giggling again. "Okay that's enough! Time for bed." "Can you rest with me tonight? I don't wan't to be alone." I will be going to watch in a hour. You warn her. "Please?" She stares at you hopefully. Ok! Ok! Just enough with the face! You fake desperation. She cheers and hops into bed. You get in after her and she snuggles next to you. "Goodnight Kate." Goodnight Rai." She answers before closing her eyes. You watch her sleeping next to you and smile. Don't let this change you Kate. you make that thought before closing your eyes and going to sleep.
155332222222211111111111111111111111.title: A Reason to Coninue

1553322222222111111111111111111111111.content:
The night went off without any incidents. You woke up to sunlight through the window. You find that Kate is still asleep next to you. You gently nudge her. "Come on lil sis, time to get up." You tell her. She groans from you interrupting her sleep, "five more minutes?" She gets out. You nudge her again, a little firmer this time. "Sorry, we need to take advantage of this moment." She groans again, but starts to move until she's in a sitting position. "Good job." You tell her while getting rid of sleep in her eyes. "Come on, let's go check on the others."

         Walking to the living room, you note that the room Rachael stayed in is closed. "Rachael, you up in there?" you ask as you began to open the door. You were suddenly pushed back. "Don't come in here Rai! I'm a mess!" Rachael cries out. You then realize what is going on. "Rachael, this isn't a good time to worry about that." You try reasoning with her, but your friend responds back by saying, "Maybe you can go around looking like that, but I take pride in my look." You sigh when you realize that this is a fight you can't win. The infecteds aren't going to mind when you're sliding down their throats "Is she going to be ok?" Your sister ask in confusion. You reassure her that she's fine and she'll meet up later.

         Upon entering, you see Neku leaning with his back on the wall. "Morning." The zoroarks head snaps up from hearing your voice. Apparently, he was deep in thought. "Oh hey," he replies back. "Is something wrong?" You ask him. Huh? Oh it's nothing. Don't worry about it." You're unconvinced, but you let it go. Noticing there's only two of you the dark fox ask, "Where's the buneary?" Not wanting to mention her "predicament", you just said. "She'll be here in a moment." Right after you finish, a voice adds, "And it's Rachael, by the way." You turn to see your friend walking towards you, tying her second ribbon in her left ear.

         Seeing that everyone's present, Neku starts to speak. "Hope all of you got a good amount of sleep cause we're leaving. We can talk while we move." Before he can do anything, you say, Hold on, do you know a place we can refill our bottles with water? We're running out." The fox takes a look at you for a moment before replying, "I saw a small stream close outside of town,but you'll need to be quick." You nod and then he opened the door a bit to peek out to check if the coast is clear before opening it completely.

((Neku as joined you as a guest 'for now'))

         The four of you walk onwards, you three trailing close behind Neku. You notice that he's slowing his movement so that you three can catch up. He turns his head so that he's looking at you and Rachael. "You two fought very well yesterday. Who taught you how to fight?" You thought about it and believe it won't hurt answering. "My dad was captain of the guards at our home. He was pretty strict with my training." Rachael then speaks, "Like his dad, my father taught me as well. Figured I might need to protect myself. While he wasn't a member or anything, he taught me a lot about fighting." "I see." Neku says while listening. "What happened to them?" You were silent for a moment before answering, "We'll talk about it later."

         Eventually, your group reach the stream he talked about. Flowing water fills your ears as you reach down for a pawful, but as soon as the fluids hit your tongue, you immediately spat out the foul-tasting liquid. You quickly warn the others not to drink it. "What's wrong?" Rachael ask about your concern. "The water! T..there's something wrong with it." "How so?" Neku ask next. "I can't describe it, but it has a revolting taste to it. It's not normal." There was a moment of silence before Neku saids, "I guess that means we shouldn't drink this." "Yeah, we'll find something else." You answer as you take a apple from your pack and eat it.

         Neku smirks while watching you eat. "You know, considering your look, I'm suprise you were able to move that fast to stop that poochyena from yesterday." You pause and scowl at him. "Are you saying l I'm fat?!" You ask him. "Rai, you're not exactly the slimmest person I know." Rachael answers and confirm this by poking at your stomach. "Hey, I'm not fat! This is normal standard for a raichu. You know this." You say. There are only two raichus in our town. You and your dad." Rachael explains. Your face is red as a tomato berry as you try to prevent yourself from yelling at her. "Let's just go!" You say as you start to move on the path. The buneary was shocked from your reaction. Maybe I went to far...
1553322222222111111111111111111111111.title: In the morning.

choices: You feel mysterious power building within you
15533222222221111111111111111111111111.content:
Your group continued down the path to the survivor camp Neku mentioned last night. You shiver a bit as a cold breeze blew towards you, signaling the arrival of fall. We need some clothing to fight off the coldness. You thought as you check on your sister. Kate is struggling to keep up with you three. "Are we there yet?" She whines. Neku groans at the question.That's the fourth time she ask that. He thinks this, but he calmly replies, "It's just a little further now." The zoroark turns his head towards you. "Not much stamina huh?" he whispers. "She's just a little girl. Just be patient." You answer to him.

         Rachael was walking a feet away from you. The rabbit knew you were upset with her and was unsure of how to start her apology. Eventually she inched herself closer to you and starts to speak. "Hey Rai." You turn your head towards her for a moment before looking onwards again. Your friend continues to speak "Well, uh, about what happened earlier. I, um, want to apologize." You turn to her again, this time listening to her. "It was funny I'll admit, but I should've stopped when you became upset. I didn't and that was wrong. So again, I'm sorry." You thought about her words and believe that she's sincere with it, so you say, "I forgive you."

         Her amber eyes beamed up after you answer. "Really?! Uh, T-Thank you." She gets out, obviously shocked from you forgiving her so soon. "Don't mention it. It'll take a lot more than that to really piss me off." While you are aware of your chubbiness, you just didn't like it when she kept going on with it. "Rai, you're not mad anymore?" You turn to see that Kate was able to catch up with you. "I've forgiven her, so we're cool." That brought a smile to your sisters face.

         With you three together, Neku ask, "Where you three come from anyway?" "We come from the town of Aurora." Rachael answers. He nods, but then he realize that their town and Silverhills were pretty close. With that, he ask, "How long have you been traveling out here?" "Well, to be honest, this is actually my fourth day." You admit. His eyes widen at your answer. "And you say you're going to save this world, big words from a kid." You got annoyed at that remark. "I'm not a kid!" You angrily respond. "Well, you're not a adult yet either." He fires back calmly. "You have a point there." You admit.

         You notice that she's holding the round stone you gave her. "Don't lose it now." You gently, but firmly warn her. Neku wondered what you meant before casting his eyes on Kate's item. "That's.." He starts to say before a loud buzzing can be heard, "Did you hear that?" Neku ask you. "Yeah." you reply as sparks flicker from your cheeks. Out from a thicket of trees, two beedrills came charging out, stinger arms aimed out towards you four. You and Neku dodged one while Rachael grabs Kate and jumps out of the second ones way.

         The beedrills recovered rather quickly and appeared in front of you. They're clearly infected cause of their purple incect-like eyes. You tell your sister to get back, but before she could do anything, two vines appear out of nowhere and wrapped themselves around you and Rachael! Kate scrambled back a bit and watched in horror as you two struggle to escape, but the vines won't budge as it drags them towards a thicket of trees. The source turns out to be a bayleaf hidden within, sporting purple eyes like the two bees. Neku tries to intervene, but the beedrills prevent him from helping. As you and your friend get dragged away...
15533222222221111111111111111111111111.title: Sneaky vines

155332222222211111111111111111111111111.content:
You and Rachael struggle hard against the thick vines who are pulling them closer to the infected plant pokemon. They don't yield from their movement and your friend's struggles are slowing down, tiring or losing hope, you can't tell. Your mind immediately starts flashing back your life. Your combat training with your dad, medical teachings from your mom, all the way to the promise you made to them. You respond to it by struggling even harder. I haven't come this far just to be plant food!

         Kate is hidden nearby watching the whole scene. The pachirisu is horrified at seeing her brother and his friend being caught by the feral bayleaf. She's fighting back tears in her eyes and clutching her stone in her paws. She suggesting calling out to Neku, but the fox is busy dealing with the infected hornets to provide assistance. Something, anything, please help them. Please! Your sister pleads as she tightens her grip on her stone.

         All of the sudden, a glow surrounded the small stone. Kate opened her eyes and gasp from the sight. The same glow appeared out of your pack. The bayleaf was so shocked that he let you and Rachael go. You notice this and quickly paralyze him with thunder wave, then you reach into your pack and take out your stone. "Rai, what's going on?" Rachael asked you witnessing the scene. "I-I don't know! I--" you couldn't finished as the light brightens and envelopes you.

         Neku, who was fighting off the beedrills, notices the situation and focuses the dark energy within and let it loose around him with the dark pulse attack. afterwards, he dashed towards you and Rachael. "Rai, are you ok?" Rachael tries to reach you, but you don't respond. The buneary was about to reach for you, but a fox's paw grabs her. "Don't! let it finish." "Let it finish? I don't know if he's fine." "He's fine, I seen this before." Before she ask how, the light subsides.

         You finally regain your senses after the light fades. When it brightened, you felt cut off with everything around you. You look at Rachael and Neku, both having a surprise look on them. "Guys, what's wrong?" Rachael speaks out, "Rai! Your body!" You are confused as to why she mentioned that until you take a look at yourself. Your eyes widen when you notice you look different. While your overall fur hasn't changed, you notice thunderbolt patches on your knees and two on your back. there's black fur on your upper back connected to your shoulders. Your ears colors have switched and the outside appear almost like thunderbolts. The fur on your front and hind paws are yellow instead of brown and have a thunderbolt appearance as well. Lastly, looking back, you notice that you have not one, but two tails behind you.

(Here's the website where I got this from and in case you need a idea of what he's supposed to look like. Also, just so you know, I don't own this picture. And I'm keeping the cheeks the same color.) http://raizhuw-the-real.deviantart.com/a...

         What is this? You thought as you try to figure out what going on. "Brother." you turn to see your sister, amazed at what happened. "Are you ok?" "I'm fine. It's just-" You were cut off as one of the beedrills swooped in and tackles Rachael, knocking her down. "Rachael!" You cry out before the other one goes for Kate. You quickly lash out thundershock towards it. It was unable to outmaneuver your attack and was hit, falling to the ground unconscious. You were surprise that you brought it down in one attack. Your mind turned to the bayleaf who just recovered from his paralysis. You turn to see Rachael gotten up, while sore from the bees attack. Despite your mysterious transformation, you must focus on the fight.

         "Kate, I need you to stay back! Rachael, take care of the beedrill! Neku, You're with me with the bayleaf!" You quickly order them. They nod and Rachael heads off to deal the the infected insect while you and Neku faces the plant type. The bayleaf charges towards the black fox. He doesn't seem frighten as he stands there. What's he doing? you wonder, but then he sidestep his take down and strikes him hard. That's feint attack! You thought, impressed by the sight. You launch thundershock at the bayleaf. While it was strong, it's still standing. It's standing? I guess even with this power, type differences still matter. The plant type starts gathering power in its leaf. It's preparing a solar beam attack! You need to attack, so you use...

(Author's note: I got this idea from playing Y. In case you didn't play the games or watch the anime, there is no Mega-raichu in the game or anime, the future games, and I don't know if there ever will be one in the future. I just thought it would be cool and got permission from the interactive host to do so.)
155332222222211111111111111111111111111.title: Not your usual Hidden Power

1553322222222111111111111111111111111111.content:
Opting to use a attack that isn't electric based, you harden your twin-tails till their iron-like, then lashed them towards the bayleaf. You struck it with one tail, then quickly with the other in rapid succession. The plant type staggered a bit, but was able to stay upright. Even worse, the sunlight through the clear sky help power its solar beam quickly. Oh no.. You braced yourself for the imact, but before it could fire, it was dealt with a blow out of nowhere. You realize that Neku has waited for the bayleaf to take it's focus off him and power his strike to hit you then launch night slash at it. The plant pokemon struggled to stay standing, but then collapse with a loud thud.

         You place both your paws on you knees as you try to catch your breath from the intense fight. You then think about Rachael and check to see if she's okay. Luckily, you see that while she's on one knee, you don't see the beedrill anywhere, implying that she was able to drive it off. She notice you looking at her and she comes to you. You cry out for Kate, and she comes running. You take a sigh of relief, knowing everyone's alright.

         After the battle's over, you start to feel strange again. Next thing you know, you start to glow! You and everyone else shield their eyes from the brightness. Soon enough, the glow fades, and everyone was able to see again. You take a look at yourself to see that your back to your original form again, as well as your stone was in your paws again. You stare at the orb as you try to compensate what just happened.

         Rachael begins to speak. "Rai, are you ok?" You turn to see she's staring at you with concern. "Yeah, I'm alright." You try to reassure her. Kate then voices her question, "But then, how did you do that?" You shake your head, confused of how it happened as well. Rachael then turns to Neku. "Wait, during the process, you said you've seen this before. So this happened before?" He nods, but before he gets to answer, he notices that you seem off-balance. "Whoa hey, you ok?" "Yeah...I just..Need to..Need..." You start to speak, but before you could finish, you fell to the ground unconscious.
1553322222222111111111111111111111111111.title: What Power...

1553322222222111111111111111111111111111.content:
"Trust will just make you soft."

"I'll find the one who cause this disaster and make him pay for this!"

â€œFoolish boy!"

AAAHHHHH!!!


         Hearing that scream woke you up. That dream been playing in your head for some time now. Ever since that incident burned into your mind, it appears in your dreams at different timings. While Rachael i right when she says it's not his fault, it doesn't stop it from coming every now and then.

         Taking a look around you found that your lying on a bed, your pack next to you. You also note that the scenery is different as well, meaning that you've been moved. You start to get up when a voice speaks out.

         "Rai!" You look to see Rachael coming towards you. "You ok? How are you? Are you sick? Say something!" She shakes you during the last part. You grab her shoulders and Yell, "RACHAEL! I'm fine! Calm down!"

         She snap out of it and calms down. "Sorry." You smile letting her know it's ok. You were about to ask a question before being tackled to the ground.

         You look to see it's your sister wrapped around your side. She looks at you, tears running down her face as she cries out, "Rai, you've haven't been moving for a while, I was so worried."

         You hug Kate tightly as you say, "I'm sorry for worrying you, but I'm alright". she smiles and gets off you, allowing you to get up, I knew sooner or later she'll hug-takle me to the ground you thought jokingly

         You then took note that your in a tent. "Where are we?" You ask. Your friend smiles as she answers, "We're at the camp Neku talked about." As she finishes, the tent door opens up.
1553322222222111111111111111111111111111.title: Somewhere different

1553322222222111111111111111111111111111.content:
You looked at the entrance to see a meganium entering with Neku behind him. The grass types eyes widen to see you up and about.

"Oh!" The grass type axclaimed when entering. "You shouldn't be moving already when you just woken up." Her voice let out a female voice with concern. She eyes around you, seeing if you're looking okay. You can tell she's a doctor or at least has medical experience.

You wave your arm as you say, It's okay miss. I'm fine." Despite that, she uses some vines to wrap around your arms and your head. "You can never be too careful." She speaks out in a serious tone. You know she's using them to see if your okay, but you can't help but shiver. Her eyelids flickered when she witness this. "See?"

You friend shake her head as she answers, "No! He was recalling a attack yesterday." The meganium shakes her head. "There's no need to make up stories." She said kindly.

Neku steps in then by saying, "Actually Serita, there're telling the truth." The meganium, Serita, turns to him. "What?" "On our way to the camp, we were attacked by two beedrills. While preparing to fight, a bayleaf snuck up from the trees, binding Rai and Rachael with his vines. It was problematic, but then he somehow achieved mega-evolution."

         You couldn't believe what you heard. "WHAAAT?!" You and Serita exclaimed at him. Mega-evolution, you heard about it before. You were told that some pokemon were capable of that feat, and while you didn't know all, you were sure that a raichu like you were one of them.

Neku saw your expression and said, "I know it's shocking. I've never expected a raichu to mega-evolve either, but we'll figure that out later. Our camp leader wants to speak with you." You eyelids rise out of curiosity and you turned to the others which they answered, "We never met their leader yet.

With that, the meganium finished her check up and let you go, but tells you to come back if you feel any pain. You assure her that you will and the four of you proceeded to the camp leader's quarters.
1553322222222111111111111111111111111111.title: Mega-Revelation

1553322222222111111111111111111111111111.content:
With Neku leading on, the four of you make your way to the quarter where the leader resides. As you walk, You take a look at the site. It is a pretty big place with a large wall surrounding it. With lots of logs and vines on top of each other, you can tell it was improvised and built. You notices lots of tents surrounding the area, some with the medical symbol, others with bowls and plates to represent a kitchen knitted on them. wile lots don't have em, implying that there for living. Some pokemon take a glance at the four of you, mainly you, Kate and Rachael. No surprise since they've never seen you three before.

Neku turned his head at you, "Rai, this morning the nurse came to me about you shivering and moaning in your sleep. What was that?" he ask you. The others turn their heads toward you as you answer, "It was a rough nightmare. Nothing serious." Neku nods and looks forward, but the other two look at each other in concern. Obviously they recall what you said about the nightmare attack. Kate was about to speak, but you shook your head no.

You reach up to Neku. This camp seems pretty enforced, "How does this work?" You ask, curious about how things run here.

He looks down at you. "You got a sharp eye kid. This place was made to help shelter other survivors from the infected. We built that wall to make sure we don't get ambushed, course we still get big attacks now and then, so we need to repair the wall when neccessary. There's guardtowers around some points to let us know of any upcoming threats, so we can get ready."

"How do you prepare for trouble?" Rachael ask next.

"In case of attacks, they'll make calls by having fast runners spread the news, then we gather any pokemon, male or female, who are capable to fight to help the resistance. Children are to move to a safe area and hailed there until further orders."

         As you were walking, you noticed that Kate was staying close to you, away from Neku. Seems she's nervous about the zoroark, which is weird since she didn't had problems being near him. You are also aware that your friend seems distant from him as well.

Wondering what this is about, you ask, "Did anything happened after I lost consciousness?" Everyone stopped at that.

Neku takes a deep breath before answering, "Nothing terrible, but not uneventful." You feel a sense of dread at what you'll hear, but you stare at him, intent to know what happened.
1553322222222111111111111111111111111111.title: Camp description and recalling yesterday

1553322222222111111111111111111111111111.content:
(The story is being told in Neku's POW.)

         The sun's starting to set as you enter a clearing, carrying a unconscious raichu on your back. Ever since the incident, he hasn't regain consciousness for a while. The other two started to panic, especially the pachirisu child. You explained to her that her brother is fine, that he's just resting. That still didn't get her feel better. You understand her concern though, those two are verv fond of each other and Rai has came to her rescue twice. Rachael came to her and calm her down, which seems to work. You're happy at that, you had no idea about how to deal with kids.

         You set the campfire up as Rachael sets her friends sleeping bag on the ground. With that, you place him on it. You can hear his breathing, so nothing's wrong. The buneary places her paw on Rai's forehead, checking for fevers. Kate hugs his neck tightly, silently crying.

"He's all right you two.." You try to reassure them.

Rachael looks at you, concern filled in her eyes as she reply, "I sure hope so." She takes another look at Rai, who hasn't made any movements after the strange transformation. One moment he was strong when it happened, but when he reverted back however, he passed out moments after.

"Rai! Wake up! Please wake up!" Kate keeps shaking his shoulder. His sister has been constantly trying to get her brother up. You shakily place your paw on her shoulder as you try to comfort her. "He's o-okay! Just sleeping."

She looks at you with sad eyes. "Anybody would wake up when someone shakes them." Kate answers, unconvinced by your answer. You flinched, not expecting that, but you thought fast and answer, "When one's extremely exhausted, they sleep a little longer than usual. He'll wake up soon."I hope. He'll wake up, but when? You thought that quietly.

         Everyone just hoped you come around soon.(it took some effort to convince Kate to separate from her brother.) Everyone gathered some apples and berries from their packs, since only Rai can cook. Everyone ate in silence. Kate constantly checking up on him to see if he's done anything.

Rachael looks at you and ask, "You said you saw what happened to rai before. Where? and What's it called?"

You believed it's best to explain it to them. "Rai has just achieved mega-evolution." Rachael ears perked while Kate stares confused.

"Mega-evolution?" Kate ask.

"I can answer that." Neku turns to Kate. "Mega-evolution is the ability that allows certain pokemon to evolve further than normally. In order to do so, those who are capable need two types of stones. A mega stone for the pokemon can mega-evolve, and a key stone for the person to use. Two pokemon are required to achieve this. I heard little about this, but I never thought a raichu had one." Everyone just shrug their heads.

         A noise brakes the silence. You turn your head towards the direction. "There's someone nearby! I'm going to take a look!" You say, getting up.

Rachael gets up as well. "Let me come with you-" "No!" You answer, cutting her off. "You stay here with Kate. She needs someone she knows with her to comfort her. I'll be back." She's hesitant, but doesn't say a word as you go.

Then she speaks, "Why are you-" she was unable to finish again before you say." 'It was the right thing to do.' Your friend said that."
1553322222222111111111111111111111111111.title: Info on mega-evolution

1553322222222111111111111111111111111111.content:
Neku walked through the forest, keeping an eye on whatever made that noise moments ago. As he goes, he can't help but recall that battle at the town yesterday. They were searching for anyhing they could bring back to camp then all of the sudden, they were ambushed by the infected. Two of his members were eaten and he would've joined them if it wasn't for those kids.

         It was one thing to defeat them and drive them off, but to also to say it was out of good intentions. Usually when one helps another, usually they want something from you. Trade or robbery, it depends. Also, they intend to save the world. Neku thinks about Rai. You think he's kinda crazy, but he's not stupid that's for certain. He fought very well with the grumpig, despite the blindness and was clever in defeating that ursaring.

"I don't know why," He starts off. "But I think he's got what it takes." They'll be a camp soon at this rate, The zoroark ponders what he'll do after they gets there

         A quick snap was heard nearby. Neku reacts and hid by a nearby tree. He looks to see a Mr. Mine nearby. He turned, showing his purple eyes. He's close to the camp! he realized. I need him gone.

         With that, he closes his eyes and pictures himself as a mienfoo. The infected sense something and turns to see a small fighting type behind him. seeing a easy prey, it launches a confusion at him, only to flow off him painless. The mime blinked in confusion before he striked him with shadow claw. The infected collapses.

         After that's over, You dropped the illusion and ponder what to do with him. He's too close to camp and it's not safe to move at night. With that you decided that voring the psychic type is the only option. outside You pick it up and bring his head to your mouth. He tasted good. neku's mouth accommodates to his shoulders as he reach past them. He feels the pokemon shifting inside him as he starts to stir around. You gulp again, getting to his stomach. At this, the infected starts to thrash around, trying to escape. Neku keeps a firm grip, and swallows so he's at his thighs. He kicks and squirms as he makes futile attempts to escape. He gulps down his thighs and legs, leaving his feet dangling inside. with that, he swallows one more time, sealing the infected inside him.

         Neku sighs and licks his lips, clearly enjoying the infected squirming inside his bloated stomach. Now he wonders how to explain this to the others before he turns to find them behind them, with a horrified expression on their faces.

"Oh shit." Nekus thought in his head.
1553322222222111111111111111111111111111.title: Accidential witness

1553322222222111111111111111111111111111.content:
Kate and Rachael stood where they are and watched as you and Neku argue about yesterday's incident. It's understandable, since your sister born witness something she shouldn't know about until she was older.

"You vored someone with them two watching?!?! What's wrong with you?!" You shout out in anger at Neku. "I'm not surprise that you're upset." Neku said. "Well of course I'm upset. Kate should not have seen something like that. Although not you're not completely at fault."

You turn to the two watching. "You shouldn't have followed him! He told you to stay at the camp." "I know, but I heard noise and stuff, then afterwards, so I thought I check up just in case. I didn't mean to!" Rachael defended herself. The zoroark clears his throat. "Anyhow , the infected was close by and it was late, and traveling at night is dangerous. What if he stumbled upon the camp and we could've been outnumbered. I didn't want it to come to that Rai, but I didn't really have a choice."

         As much as you don't like it, you know Neku had a point You were unconscious, it was late at night, and it was close to their position. You understand his reason, you just wished poor Kate didn't have to see it. "You only was thinking about us, so I can see why you did it." Neku nods his head. "Thank you for understanding." With that they headed off to the leader's quarters.

         The four of them reached a large tent. "This is where our leader resides. Wait here, I'll let her know you're here." Neku prepares to enter, but you said. "Wait Neku, I have something to ask you." He turns to you, waiting for your question.

"Well, we're here at your camp, and you've lost your old group, what will you do? Do you have any plains?" Neku crosses his arms, he hasn't thought about what he'll do afterwards. You continue, "Well in that case, will yo join us?" Neku and your two companions look shocked from your question. "With your help, we can stop this infection from getting worse." You explained.

Neku sighs. "I appreciate the thought and I hope you succeed, but I can't. I'm not up for a perilous journey." You sadden a bit, but you nod your head. "I understand." With that, Neku enters the tent.

Rachael looks at you. "You still wanted him to come with us? Even with what he done?" She ask. You turn to her. "It doesn't look like he's lying Rachael. I don't agree with his choice, but there wasn't much time to think." Kate pats your arm. "Um... Rai" You turn to her. "Will you ever do the same thing he did?" You stare at her with horrified eyes for a moment before responding shakily. "N-No! I wouldn't!" "But what if you have to?" "I-I mean, he didn't know other ways. I would've had something." You say quickly. "Oh okay." Kate says simply.

You made a mental sigh. You didn't expect her to ask that question. The way she looked at the sight from Neku's discription hit you hard. You clench your paws, vowing to not to vore anyone, infected or not.
1553322222222111111111111111111111111111.title: End of flashback

1553322222222111111111111111111111111111.content:
Rachael goes to interrupts him to get his mind off it. "Hey Rai, about that nightmare you mentioned earlier."

You turns your attention towards her. "It was a normal nightmare, Rachael. Not a attack." They sigh in relief. Racheal then ask, "What was it about?"

You sigh as you say, "It was..that moment...at the cave." Their face lowered a slight. "Rai-" "I know I know, I don't blame myself for what happened, but I can't forget it. I nevered killed anyone before." He whispered the last part so Rachael can only hear.

"I understand that much, and it looks like a lot to deal with." Rachael puts her arms around you in a comforting hug. "But remember Rai, you're not alone, if you ever need someone to talk to, just tell me." You smile at the comforting thought. Rai felt another hug and saw your sister wrapped around his sides. You wrapped your arms around Rachael.

They break the hug as Neku came back out. "She's ready for you three." He told them. With that, they enter the tent. They find that the inside was quite decorated. You felt Rachael huddled behind you. She wouldn't be like this unless...

You turn your attention to the pokemon in front of you, who turns out to be a Serperior. "Welcome newcomers." A female voice came out. "I'm very please to hear you arrived here safe." The grass snake turns her head towards Rachael, who was hiding behind you. "Is something wrong?"

Rachael shakes her head. "N-No it's nothing! It's just..um." You sigh as you finish her. "She had a bad experience with snake pokemon in the past." Rachael nods her head as she stayed behind you.

The Serperior nods, "I understand and I apologize for what happened before, but rest assured, I mean you no harm." She said calmly. Rachael smiles and moves a bit away from you, but still staying close.

"So from what Neku has told me, You and your small group came accross his group as they were anbushed, you were unable to save the others but you manage to save him."

You nod your head. "Yes. I'm sorry for being unable to save the others." You apologize to Neku and the Seperior. She nods. "Thank you, it's a shame for what happened to them." She sighs before continuing. "So what brings you here?"
