"Well, Neku wanted us to take us here as payment for saving his life." You answered honestly. She turns to him. "Well, we were actually quite stocked already, but considering what happened. I'm okay with you three staying here, plus I not the kind to let kids out to danger." She turned to kate who was next to you.

You nod. "I appreciate it. We would like a day for rest." Her left eye raise a bit. "Oh? a day? You intend to leave? Why's that?"

You look confused at that question, you guess that neku hasn't told her. He sighs as he answered, "We're looking for the cure for this infection."

The serperior look surprise at the visitor's response. "You two?" She ask. The three put up confused. "We had some in our camp that said they intend to try to stop this, but we haven't heard about them for months." She told them. You and Rachael exchanged glances, you're not the only ones who started this. You half expected this though.

She takes a better look at you three,"How old are you?" She asked. "Me and Rachael are 17 while in a week Kate'll be 7." You admit. She blinks a couple times to see if this is true. "You three are so young. Why are you putting yourselfs in danger to do this?" She ask him that.

"I know, and your right, this journey will have danger, but I can't let that stop me. I have a few reasons as to why. One, I made a promise to my parents that I'll stop this and return them to their normal selves." Neku blinked at that seeing that this is the first time he heard about anything involving their parents. "The second reason is because that I can't let us grow up in the world like this. This is something that won't just pass away by waiting. We got to band together and work on stopping this or every normal pokemon will either end up a meal or like the other infecteds out there. I will see things I rather forget, but I can't lose hope just because of that." You finish.

Neku and the grass type was at a lost for words from your speech. "I say, I never heard them say what you said. Well I would wish you well and you three will be welcome here at anytime you need to rest." She said, then she also adds, "Now, Neku told me something interesting about you. Apparently in one of your encounters with a infected, you acheive mega evolution."

You cross your arms as you recall that moment. "I never knew I could do that. I know only few can achieve it though, but I don't know much about it though." You admit.

She nods as she said. "Well, I don't know much either, but I do know someone who might. There's words of a soothsayer in a town some distance from here who might know something about it, maybe even about this infection. Do you have a map where I can point it out?"

You nod and take out your map and show it to her. She smiles and uses her tail to point out the area where you mark it. "Be warned I haven't heard much about it for a while, so I don't know if she's still there. Do you still want to go?" You sigh, it's a long shot, but if there's a chance to learn something about those things you should take it. Plus, this is your only lead after the Silverhills clue. "Yes, we need to go."

The Serperior nods her head. "I understand. Again, I wish you three a safe journey and best of luck." She said that, then the four of you exited the tent.
1553322222222111111111111111111111111111.title: Meeting the camp leader

1553322222222111111111111111111111111111.content:
The four of you headed outside. "I wish of you the best of luck, both with the mega-evolution knowledge and your quest." Neku said nodding his head "Thank you." You nod and starts to head off. The black fox crosses his arms. 'Hmm, call it a hunch, but I feel like he got what it takes.'

Walking some distance, your small group stopped as you did. You look upwards to see there is still some light out, "You two like to take a walk around here? Wouldn't hurt to relax now that we have a chance." You offered. Rachael looks at her friend for a moment. "You do have a point. All right then. Let's be back here when it gets dark. Be careful though, we don't know what kind of pokemon are here." Rachael nods while saying to be careful.

"Good point." You nod your headn until you felt something nudging your arm. "Rai, do you mind if I hang out with Rachael?" Kate asked. "Oh?" You asked curious. "I found she is very nice. I like to hang out with her a little more." You then thought of somethng. "Seeing the buneary as a sort of a big sister huh?" You chuckle as she looks away shyly and your rabbit friend blushing in embarrassment. You rub your sister's head. "Sure I don't mind if you hang out with her."

Kate smiles as she moved next to Rachael. "Have fun, and take care of your 'little sister' now." You gave her a teasing wink, which rewards you with a playful punch to your elbow. "Hey!' You chuckled rubbing your elbow. "Oh you know we will Rai." The two girls giggle as they headed off.

You shrugged your shoulders as you headed off in the different direction. You looked at some pokemon looking at the Raichu, some waved in good manner, others either waved in nervousness or stare, natural for seeing a stranger in tough times.

You were walking onward when you felt something bump into you from behind. You staggered a bit as you noticed a Purrloin stopping for a moment. "Sorry, in a hurry." it said in a female voice as she runs off. You sighed, "What's the rush?" he muttered as he rubs his sore shoulders, when he looked downward he finds this pink bracelet on the ground. You picked it up and wondered did the female cat dropped it. As he looked he noticed his neck felt a bit odd, but when he looked downward, he discovered his medallion's gone!

You looked around the ground nearby in a frantic search, I know I had it when I woke up. Where could it- Then your mind wandered to the feline. You!" He broke off running in her direction. He caught her walking moments later. "Stop! Thief!" the dark type turned her head and started running, "Come back here you sneaky pickpocket!" The group turn to the sight of the Purrloin being chased by a Raichu. The group resumed their usual stuff.

You ran as fast as you can, but can't seem to get any distance to the cat. He started to noticed something in the distance, so he moved towards it. The Purrloin looked to see the Raichu gone, she giggles as she made some quick turns on some pathway and enter a large tent.

The insides contained a lot of barrels and crates, obviously the storage. She sat behind a crate as she takes the Medallion and tossed it up and down, chuckling. "I was able to lose him." "Lose who?" a voice said. "This Raichu kid with this medallion. I bumped into him and swiped it off his surprised form. He chased after me, and I got to say. He was pretty swift considering his chubby look."

Your brows twitched at the mention of the word. "That was really fun. I never thought he could keep up." She giggled as she tosses it, but then she noticed her arm. "Shoot, I dropped my bracelet. Better go get it." She tossed it up one more time, but didn't felt it drop back. "Huh?" she look at her hand to see it's gone. "Ahem.." a cough sounded above her.

She looked up and shocked to see the Raichu from before on top of the crate. "Oh fuck!" she jumped up and fell on her rump. You got up and approach her, your paw extending. The cat's eyes widen in fear of getting hurt, but your paw opened to see the familiar bracelet in his paw. "You dropped this." You said to her. "Huh??" that was the only thing that got out of her mouth.
1553322222222111111111111111111111111111.title: Playful cat thief.

1553322222222111111111111111111111111111.content:
You and the Purrloin were sitting outside the tent looking at the sunlight. She was wearing the bracelet you gave back to him, and you had your father's Medallion you got back to him. "I'm was surprised you were calm about this. I expected you to yell or attack me." She pointed out.

"Yeah well, I didn't like that you took that away from me, but when we were talking, you sounded like it was very fun for you. Also when I yelled out for you to stop, I noticed people turned their heads and went back to doing their things, if any other pokemon heard that, they definitely tried to stop you or alerted someone else." You explained.

The dark type smiles as she giggles. "You got a point there." The cat stated. "So who are you? What was the meaning of this?" You asked her.

She smiles and took out a berry for her to eat, "I'm Maggie. My family reached this place some time ago. I play around by taking stuff from others and getting them to chase me. Some catches me, other times, I lose them. I never intend to keep the stuff, I just wanted to play around. I would return their stuff to them or the place they were staying in a few hours."

"So you're saying that you'll take things for them to chase you around, just for you to have fun, and you would give it back to them even if they lost you? And you expect me to believe you?"

"Well if you didn't, why didn't you try to hurt me, apprehend me or something like that? Also people would've gave chased as well." Maggie grinned at the Raichu with a smirk. "Well you have a point."

The two smiled and chat a bit until you noticed it was getting dark out. "It's getting late. While it was a crazy meeting, I was happy to meet you Maggie." "Same he... um name?"

"It's Rai." You announced. "Rai... as in.. Rai the Raichu?" She snickered and started laughing. "What a odd name. No offence though." she said as she shook your hand and headed off.

You sigh as you pretty much expect that reaction from anybody. Shrugging it off, you head back to the direction you came from, "Ah shit. I never asked them where would we be staying. I guess I'll head to the leaders tent to ask." I pointed out as he headed to the tent.
1553322222222111111111111111111111111111.title: Innocent fun.

1553322222222111111111111111111111111111.content:
After finishing her talk with Rai, Rachael was walking through the camp with Kate by her side. She was walking around enjoying seeing normal pokemon who are not trying to attack or eat her or worse. It's a nice change of pace.

"So Kate how you holding up okay?" The buneary asked sitting down to talk to her.

"I'm okay.. just a little shaken about yesterday." she explained, Rachael already know what she meant. "Yeah, it caught me by surprise too." she admitted.

"You think that black fox is okay?" Kate asked her.

Rachael thought about it. He helped them out when he needed him and they were close to that infected Mr Mine, but it was still disturbing to watch up close. "I was disturbed by his actions, but Rai explained that he didn't thought of much more ways to help and only tried to keep us safe. So I think he's okay." she explained.

Kate nod and reached into her bag and took out a apple in her bag and started eating it. "Hello there." A Kirila walked to them and wave. "Oh... hello." Kate waves nudging near to Rachael. "Sorry for making you nervous." The Kirlia bowed in respect.

"It's okay. She's like this with new pokemon." Rachael pointed out. The Kirlia smiled and sat next to Rachael. "How did you get here?"

"Me and my friend headed out of Aurora when it was overrun by the infected, we traveled to silverhills as we rescued someone who said they could take us here."

"I see..." the psychic type said. "What about your family? Where are they?"

Hearing that question, the Pachirisu started to snuffled as she hugs into Rachael closely. The Buneary saddens as she wraps her arms around her. The Kirlia saddens at the scene. "I'm very sorry for you and your sister. I didn't know."

"I'm not her sister, I'm a friend to her brother." Rachael corrects her. "Her brother? He didn't make it either?" the Kirlia asked. Rachael shakes her head. "He's here as well. We're just taking a look around this place."

The Kirlia nods. "I see, well you three are safe here now." she said as she look to see that the sun has set. "I better get going. My mom will get worried if I'm not back. Take care of yourself." she said as the psychic type heads off.

Rachael and Kate look at the girl leave as they get up as well. "This place is nice isn't it?" Kate asked. "Yeah it is." Rachael said as they started to go to the leader's tent to see where'll be able to stay.
1553322222222111111111111111111111111111.title: Girls day out

choices: What a way to wake up.
1553322222222111111111111111111111111111.content:
The sun was about to set and the gang was at the leader’s tent.

The Raichu looked at his two companions and hugged his sister. “So were the two of you able to wind down a bit?” Rai asked and Rachael said…. “ We found a rest stop Say and talked to some people. A Kirlia whos family is here.”

“Yeah, this place is pretty nice.” His 6 year old sister said.

Rai smiles at the words, but look away a bit. ‘Her family… I hope ours are okay… despite being one of the infected.’and Rai said, “Come on, let’s speak to her so we can get our spot to sleep.”

The three entered the tent and met the Serperior. “Pardon me, we would like to know where is a available tent for us to stay in?”

“Ah, I figured you never asked me about sleeping arrangements. Nikita will escort you.” When the Serperior leader said that, a Meinshao appeared from the left side of the tent. And Rai asked “ How could the Meinshao just appear like that huh?”

“Well we have sections of the tent that also go to different rooms.” The Serperior said.

“If you three are ready, I can escort you.” she said as she headed towards the entrance and wait.

The three looked at each other for a moment. “Rai, now that we have a moment of peace. We should talk about something.”

The Raichu looked at his friend. “What about?” he asked listening.

“About whether it’s best to leave and go out there again. I know your parents said for you to try to find a cure for this, but when you think about it, there are others who are probably doing the exact same thing. And we’re just kids, we shouldn’t be forcing ourselves through this mess, especially putting little Katherine through this nightmare.”

THe Raichu looked at his sister who looked back at him and looked at his medallion. They do have a point that the journey is perilous and they could easily lose their lives for this, but then every day that this world is still suffering is the increased chance they may lose their parents for good.

“I don’t know… They did say that, but they would prefer our safety over finding out this mess, but who knows what will happen to us and others.” He said not knowing what is the right thing to do. He recalled what he said to the leader, but now that he thinks about it.

“Well it’s been a long day, we’ll decide what to do in the morning.” Rachael said as they looked at the fighting type. They then walked to her and she lead them off to somewhere.

The Meinshao then lead them to a tent. “There’s 3 beds for you there. I hope you’ll be fine for the night.” Rai nods his head, “Thank you for everything.”

All three of them laid down on a makeshift bed and the girls closed their eyes, while the electric type stared up at the tent roof thinking of what to do. ‘If it comes down to it, I can leave my sister here with someone to look after… I just… oh Mom, Dad… what do I do?’ he thought as he closes his eyes.

……………………...

He was being shaken awake by someone, “You three need to wake up right now!” A voice spoke out being an Machoke.

“What’s wrong?!” Rachael asked.

“Infecteds are attacking the gate!”
1553322222222111111111111111111111111111.title: Cost and Risk

choices: The group holds back the infected's assault.
There was too much! The gate has been breached!
1553322222222111111111111111111111111111.content:
The outside was chaos as various pokemon around were running around, gathering their stuff and various pokemon. Some pokemon have hand-crafted weapons like wooden spears with stone edge, machete, anything they could come up with

Rai and co. moved to one of the guards. “What is going on exactly?” he asked trying to follow them.

“Our scouts have discovered a mob of infecteds slowly approaching the camp, it’s quite big and varied in pokemon and sizes.” the guard explained as he tried to help some pokemon gather in groups. It seems the group are leading those who don’t look like fighters to somewhere.

“There’s infected that bunch together?” Rachael asked shocked.

“It happens on occasion. We get attacks every now and then, sometimes their few. Others are more than we expected.” A female guard explained before a Furret ran to them. “Everyone, we have a problem!”

The guards and your group turned to the slinky ferret pokemon. “I just did a quick check on our special attackers and we’re short!” she explained. “What?!” The guards asked. “Some are too sick or injured to continue! And with this size, we’ll be in some trouble with some flanks.” The furret responded. “This is bad, even if we request for help, these pokemon are mostly civilians, we won’t be able to-”

“I’ll help!” Rai announced to the guards, shocking everyone around them. “Rai, wait! It’s too dangerous!” your sister explained holding your arm.

“She’s right. This is no place for a kid to get mixed up in all this, there’s a chance you might have to push even harder than usual.”

“My father was the captain of my town’s guards. He trained me dilligantly. I can help with the camp’s defenses!” he stated confidently.

“Look kid-” one said trying to change his mind, “If those infecteds breach the gates around here, we’ll all be serious trouble. We can’t take that risk!” The Raichu insisted.

The group looked at each other and the Raichu for a moment. “... it takes some kind of stones to make it here you three.” The female guard looks at the Buneary. “Do you have any special moves of your own?” “I can use ice beam and charge beam.” Rachael stated.

“You sure about this?” Rai asked.

“No, but like you said, we don’t have much choice. It’ll be some time for them to find others.” your friend stated.

“Alright, I’ll escort the pachirisu to the underground shelter, we also crafter an escape route through the undergound in case of emergency.” The furret said.

“Brother…” Kate looks at you in worry.

“Don’t worry…” The Raichu gave her a reasurring pat on the head. “A Voltaire can do anything!”

With that the girl nods and headed with the others.

At the gate, Rai and Rachael and a 8 others were gathered. “Okay, we have four pathways some infecteds will be charging from.” A Blaziken said pointing at each of the the different roads that soon intersect into the main road in front of the gate. “We need to strike at the infecteds that come out to try and breach the gate. If by off chance some get through, we have some ground fighters to deal with them. We only asist if they’re getting overwhelmed.”

The Scyther then passed each pokemon a couple of elixers. “These will keep you energized and strong, use them only when you absolutely need them! Also if you see infecteds in a group of three or more, try to strike them at the same time! Is that clear?”

Everyone nods their head and took position. Two pokemon each facing one of the corner. Rai and Rachael was facing one corner together. ‘Everything will work out.’ Rai thought in his head. ‘Just keep an eye out for any side that’s getting overwhelmed and attack.’

Soon they all saw an pokemon coming towards the gate, from the movement and the intense growling, it was an infected pokemon for sure. The Raichu zapped it with thunderbolt, making it cry out in pain and run away.

Soon, a number of them started walking down different kinds of pathways with every range attacker striking at any ones that were getting close. Some were hitting multiple pokemon at once. “Remember, don’t overexert yourself! Let others attack so you can recollect yourself.”

Rai was hearing a commotion and noticed a few infecteds fighting some of the guards at the gate. Some having wings like pidgeotto, looking like can climb, etc. The two were slghtly worried, but kept with the gate defense. “There’s a lot of them!” Some speak like that as they started to drink one of the elixirs. You decide to do the same to keep up as the numbers increase…

The infected group was fierce, but so far the defences were holding and the amount of infecteds were either falling or retreating. "Keep it up, we're almost good."

The group was getting tired, but soon the last of the infecteds in their area have been knocked out or have fled. Rai and Rachael went down of the tower and sighed in relief.

"That was close." Rachael said wiping the sweat off her forehead. "You said it." Rai agreed, paws on his knees. "We should be good for now-"

His words were cut off by a loud scream coming from somewhere to the right. They looked and were shocked to see a couple of flying types entering the area. One of them, a Flygon was carrying a Haxorous as it dropped it into the camp.

"3 infecteds are entering the camp area!" One of the guards cried out as he saw some guards heading toward the scene. Rai and Rachael headed towards the scene.

They moved through the panicking Pokemon and ended up at the spot where the infecteds were dropped, but don't see them.

"Where are they?!" One of the male guards asked.

"This is where they were dropped!" One of the female guards spoke.

"Do you think they may be hiding in wait?" Rachael asked, looking nervous.

"Stay alert." Rai told her.

Before they can react, they felt the ground shake and saw the infected dragons bursting from their hiding spots. They were knocking some of the guards away and consuming a few others.

The dragon's bellies are round and moving from the squirming pokemon within, but they don't slow down from the added weight unfortunately. Two dragons, an Altaria and a Flygon, launched themselves towards the teens with said Raichu and Buneary jumping out of the way.

The dragons came together and roared out loudly as Rai and Rachael stood side by side. They quickly looked around the area and realized the remaining guards were knocked away. "Rai we're the only ones left!"

"Brace yourself, here they come!" Rai shouted as he saw the dragon's coming to them. Rai dodges an attack with agility and shot a bolt of lightning at it. Rai and Rachael were standing against the dragon types, panting a little, but standing strong as they slowly approached. "This could be troubling. Any ideas?"

"Well dragon types are strong against my electric attacks, I do have non-electric type moves, but we're outnumbered two to three."

"Then perhaps, I'll even the odds." A familiar voice spoke and they saw Neku getting to their side.

"Neku!" Rachael cried out smiling a little.

"Not bad holding on despite the odds." Neku said getting to stance. "Though can you two keep it up?"

"We're not done yet!" Rai announce. "Let's go!"

15533222222222.title: Storyline Choices XIV

info.brief_description: Can you survive in a voracious anthro pokemon world, on the verge of apocalypse?
info.description:
You live in a world flourished with anthro pokemon, with villages and beautiful landscapes at every turn. But the world is not as peaceful as it seems. A strange infection has all of a sudden occurred, making pokemon turn violent and hungry for reasons unknown. They become unaware of their actions and lustfully hunt for food and even toys...

Simple rules that you should be able to follow as a potential writer for this interactive, hopefully:

- When I say anthro pokemon, what I mean is that they're bipedal, (walks on two legs), and nothing else is changed about the pokemon unless the pokemon is already small. If the pokemon is small, let's say, a Minun or Meowth, than their height must be raised to at least average of short human height. (4'6" or something like that.) The only thing human about these pokemon is how they stand, and their human emotions. (Possibly their fore paws can become hands if need, for example, a Bulbasaur would need its forepaws changed since they're merely circular stubs.) I'm sorry for people who are confused about that. :[

- There are NO HUMANS in this story. NO HUMANS.

- Originally infected Pokemon couldn't speak nor act normally, but I'm just gonna say fuck it and you can do what you like as author. Go crazy with what the infection of a ravenous, arousing apocalypse is to you.

- Not all Pokemon have to be an anthro since there are strange exceptions for you to use normal pokemon if they have no bipedal form such as a Weepinbell, or Horsea. There are plenty of these types of Pokemon, but please, focus on bipedal stable Pokemon. If you want, all the pokemon in your story can be normal. Just be sure you note that when starting your story. Thanks. You rock.

- This story is to be told in 2nd person or 3rd person, (2nd POV Example: You dig into your bag to find a berry that you can feed yourself with.) (3rd POV Example: Mary digs into her bag to find a berry that she can feed herself with.)

- This is a vore interactive, which means, all types of vore are allowed, EXCEPT FOR HARD VORE. That kind of vore is more disturbing to others than appealing. Oh, by the way, for authors who write unbirthing options. Unbirthing in this story means once the victim is slid up into the predator's vagina, they slowly dissolve away inside the womb into cum, basically like cock vore. The whole 'reborn as a child' thing is just dumb and wouldn't fit in this story. Then again, being devoured by a vagina is also a little stupid, but still! No rebirth, just cum-digestion. Cool beans.

- The kind of world in Viral is is set in kind of like a feudal-esque time, where houses were just tents/cabins/small buildings of stone or clay and electronics didn't exist. No cars, skyscrapers, advanced technology, etc.

- Sex is allowed, M/M, M/F, F/F, take your pick.

- All generations of Pokemon are allowed. Go nuts.

- NO GROWING, TRANSFORMING, OR SHRINKING. Please don't use this fetish for this story. Most of the other interactives on this site have it, so please, add there and all. Not here.

- I will allow large-ish pokemon, but not like, "The Pikachu was 500 ft. tall!" And crap like that. If the pokemon is already a large pokemon, like a Snorlax, Lugia, etc., then they can be twice to triple the size of your character, but no giants! Like the first rule states, you can't have super small pokemon either. This ain't that kind of freak-show interactive. It's a different kind.

- Please have a good grasp on the English language and use correct grammar. Spelling, punctuation, capitalization, sentence structure, etc.

- No few sentence chapters, (Example: Then the Golduck ate you and you were delicious. THE END. *claps frantically to self for a job well done.*)

- Infected anthro Pokemon cannot talk. They can growl, moan, etc. but they are incapable of speech.

- Digestion persists in this world so endosoma isn't really the gimmick here.

- Your character can also eat others. Having your character as both predator and prey is highly encouraged to give some variety, but I certainly won't force you to do so.

- Specific kinks that aren't banned such as pawplay, watersports, bondage, etc. are allowed and welcomed too.

- Death is allowed, and injuries are okay for your character, but try not to write an entire page about the pain and agony of characters' bones breaking or something along those gory lines. Just keep it vague or keep it quick. I'd rather not make this into a full snuff story.

- Scat is allowed. So yeah. Just try to keep your story focused on vore though.

- If you notice that there are empty chapter options that the author of the storyline had left for whatever reason and you have the urge to add to it, then you MUST ask the author of that storyline for permission to write it. Only their approval can allow you to write the chapter, otherwise, it will be deleted.

- The first chapter will explain how the infected work. Take whatever liberties as you may with such.

- Enjoy reading the story! Please do!

----|----


- December 23rd, 2019: Viral has reached over 1,000,000 chapter views! Props to all who have read, added, rated, reviewed, and pleasured themselves to this story. Seriously, holy crap. To think I spontaneously made this interactive years ago without ever thinking I'd get far into it. While I wish I worked at a faster rate, I'm still happy with how large of an interactive Viral has become, and that goes for all of the other storylines fellow authors have written. For real, thank you guys.

"Even the lamest page can be saved by collaboration"
- Philip Greenspun
